Bajaj Pulsar 125 is a popular entry-level bike available for a price ranging between Rs 81,389 - 89,254. It is fitted with a 124.4cc, air-cooled, single-cylinder engine, delivering a maximum power output of 11.64 bhp and a peak torque of 11 Nm. This bike can easily reach a top speed of 110 kmph & 50 Kmpl mileage, making it a good option for city & highway riding. The bike further comes with a total fuel tank capacity of 11.5 litres.

The engine is tuned to an efficient 5-speed gearbox & features Bajaj's DTS-i technology, enhancing the combustion process and improving power delivery and fuel efficiency. The motorcycle also has an LED tail lamp, a clip-on handlebar, a maintenance-free battery, and a nitrox mono-shock absorber. It also features a CBS (Combined Braking System), which ensures better braking stability and control.

Bajaj Pulsar 125 Engine Specifications

The Bajaj Pulsar 125 is built to have a 124.4cc, air-cooled, single-cylinder engine. This BS6 delivers a maximum power output of 11.64 bhp @ 8500 rpm & a peak torque of 10.8 Nm @ 6500 rpm. The engine is tuned to a powerful 5-speed gearbox and features Bajaj's DTS-i (Digital Twin Spark Ignition) technology. This enhances the combustion process and improves fuel efficiency. The engine also features a counter-balancer, which reduces vibrations and ensures a smoother ride.

Bajaj Pulsar 125 Price In India

Bajaj Pulsar 125 ex-showroom price in India ranges between Rs 81,389 - 89,254, depending on the various variants available.

Bajaj Pulsar 125 Technical Specifications

Here are all the technical specifications of Bajaj Pulsar 125 that make it such a popular choice in the Indian market -

Bajaj Pulsar 125 Additional Features

The additional features that make the Bajaj Pulsar 125 a well-rounded motorcycle offering excellent performance, comfort & safety at an affordable price point are-

  • Semi-Digital Instrument Cluster: Displays all the important info such as speed, fuel level, odometer, and trip meter. The digital screen is easy to read and provides all the necessary information that a rider needs while riding.
  • LED Tail Lamp: Enhances its overall looks and provides better visibility & safety while riding.
  • Clip-On Handlebar: Provides a sporty riding position & better control over the motorcycle. The handlebar also gives the motorcycle a more aggressive look.
  • Nitrox Mono-Shock Absorber: Provides excellent ride comfort and handling. This suspension system is designed to absorb shocks & vibrations, which results in a smoother & more comfortable ride.
  • Tubeless Tyres: Offer better grip and handling on the road. The tubeless tires also reduce the chances of sudden deflation, improving the motorcycle's overall safety.
  • Maintenance-Free Battery: The motorcycle comes equipped with a maintenance-free battery, which requires no regular maintenance and provides long-lasting performance.

Royal Enfield Classic 350 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Classic 350 Bike is manufactured by Royal Enfield, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Royal Enfield Classic 350 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 349 CC engine that produces 20.2 BHP @ 6100 rpm (14.87 kW) power, 41.55 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Royal Enfield Classic 350 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.
 

Royal Enfield Classic 350 is a popular cruiser motorcycle that combines retro styling with modern features. This cruiser bike is powered by a 346cc air-cooled, single-cylinder engine that produces 19.1 bhp and 28 Nm of torque. The engine is paired with a 5-speed transmission, and the bike has a top speed of around 130 kmph. This classic 350 can reach a mileage of 41.55 Kmpl and boasts a teardrop-shaped fuel tank with a total capacity of 13 litres. 
 

The Royal Enfield Classic 350 BS6 price range is Rs 1,93,080 - 2,24,755 Lakh in India. The brand offers this model along with 6 variants and 15 various colour options for users to choose from.
 

Royal Enfield Classic 350 Engine Specifications

Royal Enfield 350 classic is fitted with a 349 cc, Air/Oil Cooled 1 Cylinder 2 Valve engine, which is BS6-compliant. This exceptionally performing engine can produce a maximum power output of 20.2 bhp @ 6,100 rpm and a peak torque of 27 Nm @ 4,000 rpm. This engine comes mated to a 5-speed gearbox transmission system. 

In addition, you also get a Fuel Injection supply system that drastically improves the bike's fuel economy. The power output of Classic 350 makes it a suitable option for city riding and leisurely cruising on the highways. 

Royal Enfield Classic 350 Price In India

Royal Enfield Classic 350 price in India has helped secure it an eminent place in the Indian 2-wheeler market. The brand has given the bike a price tag of Rs 1.9 - 2.21 Lakh, which is decent given all the features it is built with. 


Royal Enfield Classic 350 Mileage

The new Royal Enfield Classic 350 is known for its fuel efficiency while delivering unmatched performance. With this cruiser bike, you can cover over 41.55 Km per litre of fuel, making it a highly pocket-friendly option for those looking to cut down on their daily fuel expenses.

Hero Passion Pro Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Passion Pro Bike is manufactured by Hero, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Hero Passion Pro Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 110 CC engine that produces 6.73 KW @ 7,500 rpm power, 60 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Hero Passion Pro Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Hero Passion Pro is a popular commuter bike manufactured by Hero MotoCorp, a leading 2-wheeler brand in India. The bike embodies a unique good design, low fuel consumption and a reasonable price. It comes in 3 variants, 5 colours, with a price ranging between Rs 74,408 - 77,408. 

The passion pro comes with a Single-Cylinder, 4 Stroke, 2 valves, and Air Cooled Engine that can easily churn out 9.02 bhp & 9.89 Nm torque. The bike further features drum brakes on either side of the wheels. Additionally, it features cool techs like digital-analogue metre, auto sail technology, i3S system & an engine cut-off in case of any malfunction.

Hero Passion Pro Engine Specifications

The Hero Passion Pro is fitted with a 113.2 cc air-cooled, 4-stroke single-cylinder engine. This BS6-compliant engine churns out a maximum power of 9.15 bhp at 7500 rpm & a peak torque of 9.79 Nm at 5000 rpm. 

In addition, the engine is equipped with Hero's innovative i3S technology, which automatically turns off the engine when idle and restarts it when needed, thereby saving fuel and reducing emissions. Furthermore, the Hero Passion Pro has a constant mesh 4-speed gearbox that delivers smooth and precise shifts.  

Hero Passion Pro Price In India

Hero Passion Pro price starts from ₹ 74,408 and goes up to ₹ 90,056 in India. 

 

Hero Passion Pro Mileage

Hero Passion Pro delivers good mileage and has some attractive features. This Hero bike has a 110 cc engine and i3S system that helps conserve fuel by turning off the engine when not in use. The Hero passion pro mileage is around 60 Kmpl, which makes it one of the most economical bikes in its segment.

 

 Hero Passion Pro Technical Specifications

The Hero Passion Pro is a standard commuter motorcycle that offers a blend of style, performance & efficiency with advanced technological specifications, including -

  • Frame: Diamond
  • Suspension: 
    • Front - Telescopic
    • Rear - Hydraulic Type
  • Brakes:
    • Front - Disc, 130 mm
    • Rear - Drum, 130 mm
    • Type - Combi Brake System
  • Wheels: 
    • Front - 457.2 mm
    • Rear - 457.2 mm
    • Type - Alloy
  • Tyres: 
    • Front - 80/100-18
    • Rear - 80/100-18
    • Type - Tubeless
  • Dimensions: 
    • Overall Length: 2,046 mm
    • Overall Width:  737 mm
    • Overall Height:  1,116 mm
    • Ground Clearance:  162 mm
    • Seat Height:  791 mm
    • Fuel Tank Capacity: 10 Litres

 Hero Passion Pro Additional Features

The Hero Passion Pro is a stylish and efficient bike with many additional features to enhance its performance and comfort. The bike has a combined braking system (CBS) that ensures better control and safety on the road. The BS6 version of the bike has a higher ground clearance of 162 mm and a raised front telescopic suspension, making it suitable for different terrains. 

The bike also has a brighter headlamp that improves visibility at night and triple-tone graphics on the fuel tank that add to its aesthetic appeal. The bike has a digital analogue console that displays information such as speed, fuel level, odometer, etc. This bike comes with tubeless tyres and alloy wheels that give better traction & stability.

Some additional features Hero Passion Pro comes with are - 

  • i3S Technology - An Idle Start-Stop System that automatically switches off the engine when idling in neutral & restarts when the clutch is pressed, helping to save fuel and reduce emissions.
  • iSmart Technology - An advanced fuel-injection system that optimizes the engine's performance and fuel efficiency while also reducing emissions.
  • Digital-Analogue Instrument Cluster - The bike comes with a modern and stylish digital-analogue instrument cluster, displaying important information such as speed, fuel level, and trip meter.

attributes.content:
Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Ninja ZX-10R Bike is manufactured by Kawasaki, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 998 CC engine that produces 200.22 bhp @ 13200 rpm power, 12 Kmpl Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R is a premium high-performance super sports bike from the Japanese manufacturer Kawasaki. The ZX-10R is a part of the Kawasaki Ninja series of sports motorcycles and has been in production since 2004. The latest model of the ZX-10R, the 2022 version, was unveiled in November 2021. Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R ex-showroom price is Rs 16.15 Lakh.

The ZX-10R is powered by a 998cc inline-four-cylinder engine, producing 200.22 bhp and 114.9 Nm of torque. The BS6-compliant engine is tuned to a 6-speed gearbox and gives a mileage of 12 Kmpl and a top speed of 299 Kmph. ZX-10R further features a total fuel tank capacity of 17 Litres, letting you cover miles before needing to refuel again. In addition, this bike is packed with future-forward electronics, including a quick shifter, multiple riding modes, traction & launch control, etc. 

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Engine Specifications

At the heart of the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R lies a BS6-compliant, Liquid-cooled, 4-stroke In-Line Four, DOHC (Dual Overhead Cam) engine type. The engine has a 16-valve design (4-valve per cylinder) and can belt out a max power output of 200.22 bhp @ 13200 rpm and 114.9 Nm @ 11400 rpm of peak torque. 

The engine comes perfectly tuned to a 6-speed gearbox transmission system with a slipper clutch that smooths shifting and reduces rear-wheel hop during hard downshifts. 

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Price In India

Check the table below for the accurate ex-showroom Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R price in India. 

 

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Mileage

Being a supersport bike, Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Mileage is fairly decent. As the company claims, the bike can cover roughly 12 km of distance per litre of petrol, which is not bad given how performance-oriented the bike is. 

 

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Technical Specifications

The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R is a high-performance motorcycle that is designed for speed and agility. In addition, the bike features multiple advanced technical specifications that make it stand out from other bikes in its class.

  • Suspension - The bike has a fully adjustable Showa Balance Free Fork (BFF) front suspension system. This advanced suspension system features a design that eliminates the traditional fork springs and replaces them with a hydraulic system that provides smoother and more consistent damping. At the rear, the bike is equipped with a fully adjustable Showa Balance Free Rear Cushion (BFRC) shock absorber, which provides excellent damping and stability in all conditions.
  • Brakes - This bike is fitted with Brembo M50 monobloc callipers paired with dual 330 mm semi-floating petal discs in front. For the rear, it has a single 220 mm petal disc brake. Additionally, it comes with Kawasaki’s Intelligent anti-lock Brake System that provides additional control and safety in various riding conditions.
  • Tyres - This Ninja bike features a set of tubeless tyres with a front tyre size of 120/70ZR17 inches and a rear tyre size of 190/55ZR17 inches. These tyres are known for providing added stability and maximum traction over roads. 
  • Dimensions - Ninja ZX-10R comes with a wheelbase of 1450 mm that provides the bike with added stability even when driven at higher speeds. Additionally, the bike has a total length of 2085 mm, a width of 750 mm, a height of 1185 mm, and an overall ground clearance of 135 mm.

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Additional Features

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R is a sporty bike that comes with a number of advanced features, which are -

  • Ride Modes: The motorcycle comes with three ride modes - Rain, Road and Sports- allowing the rider to adjust the mode per the road conditions.
  • Quick Shifter: The quick shifter allows for seamless and fast upshifts without the need for the rider to use the clutch.
  • Traction Control: Ninja ZX-10R features advanced traction control that helps the rider maintain control in slippery conditions by adjusting the power delivery to the rear wheel.
  • Anti-lock Braking System (ABS): The motorcycle has an innovative ABS that prevents the wheels from locking up during hard braking.
  • LED Headlights: The bike features high-quality LED headlights that provide excellent visibility in low-light conditions.
  • Electronic Cruise Control: This feature allows riders to reach a desired speed and maintain it with a simple press of a button. On activation, riders don’t have to apply the throttle, making the ride smoother and stress-free. 
  • TFT Display: The Ninja ZX-10R comes with a full-colour 4.3” all-digital TFT display that provides the rider with all the necessary information, including speed, gear position, fuel level, and more.
  • Launch Control: The Ninja ZX-10R features launch control that allows the rider to launch the motorcycle off the line with maximum acceleration.

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Variants

Kawasaki offers Ninja ZX-10R BS6 in 1 other variant with a price tag of Rs 16.15 Lakh in India.

 

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Competitors in the Market

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R has 3 major competitors in the market that offer similar advanced features and power delivery that you must consider before making the decision. 

  • Suzuki Hayabusa - Rs 16.41 Lakh
  • BMW R 1250 R - Rs 23.95 Lakh
  • Ducati Hypermotard 950 - Rs 15.6 - 17.99 Lakh

Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Monthly Sales

Here’s a look at the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R sales number for the previous 3 months.

 

Why BikeJunction for Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R?

BikeJunction is a one-stop destination where you can explore and learn all the information regarding the new Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R Price in India, technical specifications and more. In addition, you can use our innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put the Ninja ZX-10R against its other rivals in the market. 

We have also made an exclusive section where you can find all the authentic Kawasaki dealership showrooms in your preferred city, along with their address and contact details.

Furthermore, you get all the latest bike and brand updates in our news section. So now you can find Kawasaki Ninja ZX-10R mileage, engine type, power output, weight, handling, ergonomics and more all under one roof. So, what are you waiting for? Bring home the keys to your new Ninja ZX-10R bike today with BikeJunction!

attributes.content:
Hero Maestro Edge 125 Scooter is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Maestro Edge 125 Scooter is manufactured by Hero, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Hero Maestro Edge 125 Scooter belongs to the Scooter category. The Scooter boasts high-tech specifications like 124.6 CC engine that produces 8.98 bhp @ 7000 rpm power, 65 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Hero Maestro Edge 125 Scooter is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Hero Maestro Edge 125 is among the most popular scooters manufactured by Hero MotoCorp, priced at Rs 77,896 - 86,766. Maestro Edge 125 is powered by a powerful 124.6 CC engine and features an aerodynamic design, offering an ideal combination of power and comfort. Moreover, the scooter offers a fantastic mileage delivery of 65 Kmpl, making it a highly efficient scooter option in the market. Additionally, this scooter can easily achieve a top speed of 90 Kmph. 

Along with an attractive Hero Maestro Edge price point, it also features a range of future-forward tech promoting best-in-class performance. These features include - a digital speedometer, a remote key and an external fuel-filling system. This BS6-compliant scooter is available in multiple colour options & 4 variants. It perfectly caters to the needs of riders looking for a versatile & reliable scooter for their daily commute around the city. 
 

Hero Maestro Edge 125 Engine Specifications

 

The Hero Maestro Edge 125 is fitted with a powerful & efficient BS6-compliant engine. It is powered by a 124.6cc, air-cooled, 4-stroke, SI, single-cylinder engine. This engine can effortlessly belt out a maximum power of 8.98 bhp @ 7,000 rpm & a peak torque of 10.4 Nm @ 5,500 rpm. Additionally, Maestro Edge has a Variomatic Drive transmission that offers smooth & effortless acceleration.

The engine is tuned to a Fuel Injection system, ensuring precise & efficient fuel delivery that results in improved engine performance with reduced emissions. In addition, this scooter is further equipped with an Advanced Sensor Technology (AST) system. This system provides users with real-time feedback to the engine control unit, enabling it to adjust the fuel injection & ignition timing for optimum performance.

 

Hero Maestro Edge Price In India

 

Hero HF Deluxe price starts from ₹ 77,896 and goes up to ₹ 86,766 in India.

 

Hero Maestro Edge 125 Mileage

Equipped with an advanced Fuel Injection system, the Hero Maestro Edge 125 mileage is quite high - 65 Kmpl, making it a fuel-efficient option for users. 

 

Hero Maestro Edge 125 Technical Specifications

Following are the technical specifications of the Hero Maestro Edge 125 that provide a balance of power, efficiency, comfort, and safety.

  • Transmission: Variomatic Drive transmission offers smooth and effortless acceleration. This transmission is low-maintenance & user-friendly, which makes it an ideal scooter for city commutes and long rides.
  • Suspension: Comes with a telescopic hydraulic shock absorber at the front and unit swing with a spring-loaded hydraulic damper at the rear. This setup provides better stability and control.
  • Brakes: Equipped with an Integrated Braking System (IBS), which synchronises the front & rear brakes for better control and stopping power. The front brake is a 130mm disc brake, while the rear brake is a 130mm drum brake.
  • Wheels & Tyres: Has 457.2 mm alloy wheels that provide better stability & handling, especially at high speeds. The wheels are paired with tubeless tyres with sizes 80/100 - 18 (front) and 100/80 - 18 (rear), which offer better grip and traction, even on wet roads. 
  • Dimensions & Weight: 
    • Comes with dimensions of 1,843mm (length) x 715mm (width) x 1,190mm (height). 
    • It has a wheelbase of 1,261mm and a ground clearance of 155mm. 
    • It has a kerb weight of 111 kg, making it easy to handle & manoeuvre in traffic. 
    • The seat height of 775mm is also comfortable for riders of various heights.

Hero Maestro Edge 125 Additional Features

Here are a few of the additional advanced features of the Hero Maestro Edge 125:

  • Side Stand Indicator: Reminds the rider to retract the side stand before starting the engine. This helps prevent accidental damage to the scooter’s engine and also enhances the rider’s safety.
  • External Fuel Filling: This makes it easy to refuel the scooter without having to open the seat or remove any parts. This feature adds to the user’s convenience and saves time.
  • Mobile Charging Port: Allows riders to charge their mobile phones or other electronic devices on the go. This is a handy feature for riders who like to stay connected on the go.
  • Boot Light: Illuminates the under-seat storage compartment, making it easy to locate and access items stored in the compartment. This feature is especially useful in low-light conditions.
  • LED Tail Lamp & Turn Indicators: Provide better visibility and enhance the scooter’s safety. LED lights are brighter and consume less power compared to conventional bulbs, which also contributes to better fuel efficiency.
  • Digital Instrument Console: Displays various information such as speed, fuel level, odometer, trip metre, and a service reminder. This feature provides the rider with important information at a glance and helps keep track of the scooter’s performance and maintenance schedule.

Hero Maestro Edge 125- Variants

Hero Maestro Edge 125 is offered in 4 variant models for you to choose from.

attributes.content:
TVS Apache RTR 160 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Apache RTR 160 Bike is manufactured by TVS, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. TVS Apache RTR 160 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 159.7 CC engine that produces 15.31 bhp @ 8,400 rpm power, 50 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. TVS Apache RTR 160 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

 

The TVS Apache RTR 160 is among the top street bikes in India. It has many significant features and comes with a price tag of Rs 1.14 - 1.25 Lakh. It boasts a sporty design, a powerful engine, and a range of features that make it a versatile and fun ride. The bike is available in 5 variants and 5 colours. Furthermore, with this bike you can easily achieve a mileage of 50 kmpl and a top speed of 107 Kmph.

 

The bike is powered by a 159.7 cc BS6 engine that delivers 15.31 bhp power and 13.9 Nm peak torque. The engine is equipped with Race Tuned Fuel Injection (RT-Fi) technology that improves power delivery, fuel economy, engine durability, and emission control. The engine is tuned to a 5-speed super-slick gearbox that offers precise and smooth shifting.

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 Engine Specifications

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 is powered by a fuel-injected 159.7 cc single-cylinder 2-valve SOHC air-cooled engine. It produces 15.31 bhp of power at 8,400 rpm and 13.9 Nm of peak torque at 7,000 rpm. It is paired with a 5-speed gearbox that offers a smooth and precise shifting experience. It also gets 'Glide Through Technology', which maximise revs at low-throttle openings and prevents the engine from stalling.

The engine has Race Tuned Fuel Injection (RT-Fi) technology that enhances power delivery, fuel economy, engine durability, and emission control. The engine also features Race Derived O3C technology that improves cooling efficiency and performance.

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 Price In India

TVS Apache RTR 160 price starts from ₹ 1,14,000 and goes up to ₹ 1,25,000 in India. 

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 Mileage

 

The TVS Apache RTR 160 has an ARAI-certified mileage of 50 kmpl. However, the mileage may vary depending on riding style, road conditions, traffic, maintenance, and fuel quality.

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 Technical Specifications

 

Here are some of the key technical specifications of the TVS Apache RTR 160:

 

TVS Apache RTR 160 Additional Features

 

The TVS Apache RTR 160 has additional features that enhance its appeal and functionality. These features are- 

  • 3 Ride Modes - The bike gets three ride modes – Urban, Rain, and Sport – that adjust the ABS and engine performance according to different riding conditions.
  • SmartXonnect - SmartXonnect technology connects the bike with your smartphone via Bluetooth. It displays information such as speedometer, odometer, trip metre, gear indicator, fuel level, service reminder, navigation assist, etc.
  • Voice Assist - The SmartXonnect feature also comes with a voice assist function that lets you control various functions such as music playback, phone calls, ride modes etc.
  • Racing Double-Barrel Exhaust - The bike gets a double-barrel exhaust system that enhances the exhaust note and improves the engine performance by expelling gases faster.
  • Gear-shift Indicator - The bike gets a gear indicator on the instrument cluster that shows you which gear you are in for optimum performance.
  • Adjustable Levers - 3-step adjustable brake and clutch levers feature CAM adjusters to keep you comfortable. In addition, the levers can be easily adjusted without any additional tools.

attributes.content:
TVS Sport Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Sport Bike is manufactured by TVS, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. TVS Sport Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 109.7 CC engine that produces 8.18 bhp @ 7350 rpm power, 70 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. TVS Sport Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

TVS Sport is a commuter bike with excellent mileage, performance and style that comes with a price tag of Rs 64,050 - 70,223. It is powered by a 109.7 CC fuel-injected engine that delivers 8.18 bhp of power and 8.7 Nm of torque. The bike has a 4-speed manual transmission and a Synchronised Braking System. The bike has a kerb weight of 110 kg & a fuel tank capacity of 10 litres. 

Additionally, the bike boasts a sleek design with LED DRLs, a two-pod instrument cluster and an econometer. The bike is available in 2 variants and 7 colour options for users to choose from.

TVS Sport Engine Specifications

The TVS Sport has a single-cylinder, 4-stroke, fuel-injected, air-cooled spark ignition engine that has a displacement of 109.7 cc. The engine produces a maximum power of 8.18 bhp at 7350 rpm and a maximum torque of 8.7 Nm at 4500 rpm. The engine has a bore of 53.5 mm and a stroke of 48.8 mm. The compression ratio is 9.6:1, & the ignition system is digital CDI.

TVS Sport Price In India

The TVS Sport has two variants, and the base model is Kick Start- Alloy wheels. TVS Sport price starts from ₹ 64,050 and goes up to ₹ 70,223 in India. However, the price of TVS Sport may vary depending on the dealership location, model and colour.

 

TVS Sport Mileage

The TVS Sport claims to offer an average mileage of 70 kmpl. This is achieved by the ETFi (Eco Thrust Fuel Injection) technology that optimises fuel delivery and combustion for better efficiency and performance. The bike also has an econometer that guides the rider in the most economical mode.

 

TVS Sport Technical Specifications

The TVS Sport has a tubular single cradle frame, telescopic oil-damped front suspension, and a 5-step adjustable hydraulic shock absorber rear suspension. The bike is fitted with drum brakes on both wheels with a diameter of 130 mm at the front & 110 mm at the rear. The bike has alloy wheels wrapped with tubeless tyres of size 2.75 x 17 at the front and 3 x 17 at the rear. The bike has a wheelbase of 1236 mm. Furthermore, TVS Sport comes with a ground clearance of 175 mm & a seat height of 790 mm. 

TVS Sport Additional Features

Some of the additional features of TVS Sport that enhance its appeal and convenience are:

  • LED DRLs give a stylish look to the bike and improve visibility.
  • Two-pod instrument cluster gives a clear display of the speedometer, odometer, fuel gauge and eco metre.
  • Electric start enables riders for smooth and quick-easy starts.
  • The bike’s longer seat provides comfort and enough space for the rider and pillion.
  • The chrome muffler guard protects the bike against heat & adds to the aesthetics.
  • The bike’s synchronised braking system reduces braking distance & improves stability.

TVS Sport Variants

The TVS Sport bike is available in 2 variants based on the starting mechanism. The two variants are kick-start and self-start. The kick-start variant has only a kick lever to start the engine, while the self-start variant has both a kick lever and a self-start button.

 

TVS Sport Competitors in the Market

The TVS Sport faces competition from other commuter bikes in the same segment, such as:

 

Why BikeJunction for TVS Sport?

BikeJunction is a platform that helps you get the easiest access to complete information on the TVS Sport bike in India. With us, you get accurate details on TVS Sport engine capacity, mileage, top speed and more. In addition, you also check your nearest authorised TVS dealership stores, EMI options, etc. 

Furthermore, you can also compare TVS Sport with your other preferred options in the market with our easy-to-use comparison tool. And if you like to stay up-to-date on the latest news around the Indian two-wheeler industry, you should check out our news section and web stories.

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Scooter is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Ray ZR 125 Scooter is manufactured by Yamaha, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Scooter belongs to the Scooter category. The Scooter boasts high-tech specifications like 125 CC engine that produces 8.09 bhp @ 6500 rpm power, 52 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Scooter is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 is a popular 125cc scooter model by Yamaha Motor Company available for Rs 83,730 - 93,530. The scooter is offered in 4 variants for you to choose from. It is powered by a 125cc, single-cylinder, air-cooled engine, delivering 8.09 bhp & 10.3 Nm. With a CVT automatic gearbox, the scooter gets smooth power delivery & efficient performance. With this BS6-compliant engine, you can easily achieve a mileage of 52 Kmpl & a top speed of 90.78 Kmph. 

It further comes with 21 Litres under-seat storage. The Yamaha scooter is known for its highly responsive acceleration & good low=end torque. Advanced features like LED lighting, digital instrument cluster, alloy wheels & tubeless tyres make it a spectacular choice for short city riding conditions.  

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Engine Specifications

At the heart of Yamaha Ray ZR 125 lies a powerful 125cc, single-cylinder, air-cooled engine, churning out 8.09 bhp @ 6500 rpm & 10.3 Nm @ 5000 rpm. In addition, the engine is tuned to a CVT automatic gearbox system, providing smoother & efficient power delivery. 

The engine further features a fuel injection system that ensures precise fuel delivery and efficient combustion, resulting in improved fuel efficiency and lower emissions. The scooter also features Yamaha's Blue Core technology, optimising combustion and reducing power loss, resulting in better performance and improved fuel efficiency.

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Price In India

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Mileage

Thanks to the highly responsive & powerful engine, Yamaha Ray ZR 125 mileage is 52 Kmpl.

 

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Technical Specifications

Here are all the technical details of the Yamaha Ray ZR 125 that put it above all its rivals in the Indian market. 

 

Yamaha Ray ZR 125 Additional Features

The Yamaha Ray ZR 125 comes loaded with a variety of advanced features that make it stand out in its segment, some of which are:

  • LED Position Lights: Enhance its premium appeal and provide better visibility on the road.
  • Digital Instrument Cluster: Shows all the important such as speed, fuel level, odometer, trip meter, and more. 
  • Front Disc Brake: Provides efficient and reliable stopping power. The brake offers excellent bite and modulation, ensuring a safe and confident ride.
  • Alloy Wheels: Enhance its sporty look and provide better stability and handling. 
  • Tubeless Tyres: Offer better grip and handling, especially on wet roads. The tyres are also puncture-resistant, ensuring a hassle-free riding experience.
  • Underseat Storage: The scooter features a spacious under-seat storage compartment of 21 Litres that can accommodate a full-face helmet and other small items. 
  • Comfortable Seat: Provides a relaxed riding posture, even on long rides. The scooter also features spacious footrests that add to the overall comfort of the rider.

The Honda Activa 125 is India’s highest-selling scooter model, sold at a price ranging between Rs 78,082 - 85,254. This Activa scooter is known for its reliability, comfort & best-in-class fuel efficiency. Boasting a stylish design, it draws power from a Fan Cooled 1 Cylinder and 2 Valve engine, delivering 8.18 bhp & 10.3 Nm peak torque. With a total fuel tank capacity of 5.3 Litres, the scooter can cover 249.1 km before refuelling is required. 

The Activa 125 quickly became a trendsetter with its H-Smart technology. The smart key will add to your convenience, comfort & ease. Honda Activa 125 features Honda’s Enhanced Smart Power (eSP) technology that significantly reduces emissions & enhances fuel economy. Additionally, it features a smart-sensor-based PGM-FI system that adjusts air & fuel concoction for consistent performance, better fuel economy & lower emissions. 

Honda Activa 125 Engine Specifications

Honda Activa 125 is equipped with a Fan Cooled, 1 Cylinder, and 2 Valve 124cc engine that promotes best-in-class power and pickup. This BS6-compliant engine belts out a maximum power output of 8.18 bhp @ 6,500 rpm and a peak torque of 10.3 Nm @ 5,000 rpm. 

Moreover, the eSP technology ensures class-leading mileage and performance. The engine further features an Idling Stop System that automatically turns off the engine when on brief stops.

Honda Activa 125 Price In India

Honda Activa 125 price in India is highly competitive in the segment, set between Rs 78,082 - 85,254.

Honda Activa 125 Mileage

Honda Activa 125 mileage is 46.5 Kmpl, which is phenomenal in its segment. 

Honda Activa 125 Technical Specifications

Soon after Honda Activa 125 was launched, it quickly became a trendsetter with its advanced technical specifications, including - 

Honda Activa 125 Additional Features

The Honda Activa 125 comes with various additional features that enhance its functionality, comfort, and convenience. Some of the notable additional features found in the Honda Activa 125 include:

  • Idle Stop System (ISS): Automatically switches off the engine after a few seconds of idling to save fuel. The engine restarts instantly when the throttle is twisted.
  • External Fuel Filler: Allows for convenient refuelling as the fuel filler cap is located outside the storage compartment, eliminating the need to open the seat for refuelling.
  • Mobile Charging Socket: Offers a convenient mobile charging socket, allowing riders to charge their smartphones or other electronic devices while on the go.
  • Remote Seat Opener: Offer a remote seat opener feature, allowing riders to conveniently open the seat without using a key.
  • Engine Start/Stop Switch: Allows riders to conveniently start or stop the engine without using the ignition key.
  • Combined Braking System (CBS): Automatically distributes braking force between the front & rear wheels for safer and controlled braking.

Honda Activa 125 Variants

Honda offers Activa 125 in 4 various variants for users to choose from -

Hero HF Deluxe Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The HF Deluxe Bike is manufactured by Hero, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Hero HF Deluxe Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 97.2 CC engine that produces 5.9 kW @ 8000 rpm power, 65 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Hero HF Deluxe Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Hero HF Deluxe is among the highest-selling entry level commuter bikes by Hero MotoCorp in the Indian market. This bike has a sturdy bulletproof built quality, simple design, high mileage of 60 Kmpl & a top speed of 87 kmph. This Hero bike is offered at an ex-showroom price range of Rs 59,990 - 67,138 in India.

It is powered by a BS6-compliant 97.2cc, air-cooled, 4-stroke single-cylinder engine that belts out 7.91 bhp & 8.05 Nm torque. The bike further features an electric start, integrated braking system, i3S technology, tubeless tires. The fuel tank capacity is 9.8 ltrs and can cover 591.5 km on a full tank. This bike is available in 8 different colours & 4 different variants.

 

Hero HF Deluxe Engine Specifications

HF Deluxe is Powered by a highly responsive 97.2 cc air-cooled, 4-stroke, single-cylinder engine. This BS6-compliant engine can effortlessly produce 5.9 kW @ 8000 rpm of maximum power & 8.05 Nm @ 5,000 rpm of peak torque.

The engine has a smart fuel system and XSens tech that adjusts fuel and air for better performance and mileage.

 

Hero HF Deluxe Price In India

Hero HF Deluxe price starts from ₹ 59,990 and goes up to ₹ 67,138 in India.

 

Hero HF Deluxe Mileage

Hero HF Deluxe Mileage claimed by the company is to be roughly around 65 kmpl, making it a highly fuel-efficient option in the market.

 

 Hero HF Deluxe Technical Specifications

Hero HF Deluxe is the top choice for daily commuters due to its advanced technical features & specifications. Check the table below to know more -

 

Hero HF Deluxe- Colour options

Hero HF Deluxe is available in 8 various colours for you to choose from, including -

  • Nexus Blue,
  • Black with Sports Red,
  • Techno Blue,
  • Candy Blazing Red,
  • Heavy Grey with Black,
  • Heavy Grey with Green,
  • Heavy Grey with Purple,
  • Black with a mix of Red and Gold

 

Hero HF Deluxe Additional Features

Some additional features of the Hero HF Deluxe motorcycle include:

  • i3S Start/Stop tech turns off the motorcycle engine in neutral and restarts when the clutch is pressed.  It helps in saving fuel and reducing carbon emissions.
  • iBS braking technology Applies both front and rear brakes simultaneously. It provides better control and stopping power, especially on wet or slippery roads.
  • Tubeless tires - Less prone to punctures and can be repaired easily in case of a leak.
  • Strong and lightweight frame - Made from high-tensile steel helps to improve stability and handling, as well as reduce overall weight.
  • Graphics & Colours - This commuter motorcycle has cool graphics and colours that make it look more sporty and modern on the road.

 

Hero HF Deluxe- Variants 

Hero MotoCorp offers HF Deluxe in 4 variants with various price points - 

 

Hero HF Deluxe - Major Competitors

Hero HF Deluxe is one of the best-selling bikes in India due to its reliability, efficiency, comfort, and economical. It appeals to customers looking for a practical and economical bike for daily commuting. It competes with other bikes in the 100 cc segment, such as:

TVS Radeon Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Radeon Bike is manufactured by TVS, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. TVS Radeon Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 109.7 CC engine that produces 8.08 bhp @ 7,350 rpm power, 65 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. TVS Radeon Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

TVS Radeon is a commuter bike that offers a blend of style, comfort, and performance. TVS Radeon price ranges between Rs 60,925 - 78,834 in India. It boasts a durable and efficient engine that delivers a mileage of 65 Kmpl and lets riders easily achieve a top speed of 90 Kmph. The Radeon is available in 5 variants with multiple colour options.

The Radeon has multiple features that make it stand out from the crowd, including a reverse LCD cluster, a chrome bezel headlamp, a USB charging port, a side-stand indicator with a beeper, and a synchronised braking system. The bike has a classic design with chrome elements and a comfortable riding posture. The bike has a total fuel tank capacity of 10 litres & a kerb weight of 116 kg.

TVS Radeon Engine Specifications

The TVS Radeon is powered by a robust 109.7 cc Air Cooled, 1 Cylinder, 2 Valve engine that produces 8.08 bhp at 7,350 rpm and 8.7 Nm at 4,500 rpm. The engine is synced to an all-4-up manual gearbox that offers smooth and easy shifting. The engine also features an Ecothrust fuel injection system that ensures optimal fuel delivery and combustion for better performance and mileage. The engine comprises a bore and stroke of 53.5 mm and 48.8 mm, respectively, and a compression ratio of 9.6:1.

TVS Radeon Price In India

TVS Raider 125 price starts from ₹ 60,925 and goes up to ₹ 78,834 in India. However, the price may vary in various states depending on the different state and transport policies. 

 

TVS Radeon Mileage

The TVS Radeon claims to offer a mileage of under standard test conditions. However, the actual mileage may vary between 65 to 70 kmpl depending on the riding conditions, maintenance, and rider’s habits. The Radeon has a fuel tank capacity of 10 litres, which gives it a decent range of over 650 km on a full tank.

 

TVS Radeon Technical Specifications

The TVS Radeon is a standard commuter bike offering an ideal blend of style, performance & efficiency with advanced technological specifications, including - 

  • Frame: Single Cradle Tubular Frame
  • Suspension: 
    • Front - Telescopic oil damped shock absorber
    • Rear - 5 step adjustable hydraulic shock absorber
  • Brakes:
    • Front - 130 mm Drum Brakes
    • Rear - 110 mm Drum Brakes
    • Type - SBT (Synchronised Braking Technology)
  • Wheels: 
    • Front - 18 inch
    • Rear - 18 inch
    • Type - Alloy Wheels
  • Tyres: 
    • Front - 2.75 X 18 
    • Rear - 3.00 X 18
    • Type - Tubeless 
  • Dimensions: 
    • Overall Length: 2,025 mm
    • Overall Width:  705 mm
    • Overall Height:  1,080 mm
    • Ground Clearance: 180 mm
    • Fuel Tank Capacity: 10 Litres

TVS Radeon Additional Features

The TVS Radeon has several additional features that enhance its appeal and convenience. Some of these features are:

  • Reverse LCD cluster - Displays the clock, service indicator, low fuel indicator, real-time mileage display, odometer, trip metre, fuel gauge, speedometer, high beam indicator, neutral indicator, turn signal indicator, and side stand indicator with beeper.
  • USB charging port - Allows the rider to charge their mobile phone or other devices.
  • Chrome bezel headlamp - This feature gives the bike a premium look with its chrome finish around the halogen headlamp.
  • Synchronised braking system - Ensures better braking stability and safety by applying both brakes simultaneously when either brake lever is pressed.
  • Dura grip tyres - These tyres offer better grip and durability in different road conditions.

Bajaj Platina 110 was relaunched by the brand in December 2022 with an introduction of single-channel ABS. Due to this feature, this bike became the first and the most affordable in its segment. Platina 110 is one of the most highly powerful commuter bikes in its segment, with a price range of Rs 68,544 - 72,224. It is offered with 2 other variants and comes in 3 striking colour options. 

It is powered by a 115.45cc, 4-Stroke, Single Cylinder BS6 compliant engine type that belts out 8.48 bhp and 9.81 Nm torque. The BS6 Platina 110 has a combined braking system as standard with drum brakes both front and rear. The bike has a total fuel tank capacity of 11 litres and delivers a mileage of 70 kmpl. With this powerful commuter bike, you can reach a top speed of 90 kmph. 

Platina 110 Engine Specifications

Bajaj Platina 110 is powered by a 4-Stroke, Single-Cylinder engine type that belts out 8.48 bhp @ 7000 rpm and 9.81 Nm @ 5000 rpm. This BS6-compliant engine is perfectly tuned to a 4-speed gearbox. With this bike, you can easily zip through the city traffic, thanks to its wider speed range and better torque.

Bajaj Platina 110 Price In India

Bajaj Platina 110 Price in India is counted as the most affordable commuter bike that features ABS. Check the ex-showroom price of this BS6 bike below.

Bajaj Platina 110 Mileage

With Platina 110, you can enjoy unmatched mileage and better pick-up than ever. Bajaj Platina 110 mileage is 70 kmpl, which will help you cover an extra mile without needing to refuel.

Platina 110 Technical Specifications

Bajaj Platina 110 is equipped with multiple future-forward technical components that help users get the best driving experience. 

  •  
    • Braking System - The braking duties on the bike are handled by 130 mm front & 110 mm rear drum brakes. It further features a combined braking system as standard.
    • Suspension System - This bike features a tubular semi-double-cradle frame fitted to a Hydraulic telescopic fork of 135mm travel at the front and an SOS with nitrox canister Rear wheel stroke of 110 mm at the rear.  
    • Type of Tyres - Platina 110 has 80/100-17, 46P & 80/100-17, 53P tubeless tyres.
    • Dimensions - This bike is 2006 mm in length, 741 mm in width and 1255 mm in height. Furthermore, it has a wheelbase of 1255 mm and a ground clearance of 200 mm. 
    • Weight - This Bajaj bike has a kerb weight of 122 kg & a gross weight of 252 kg.

Platina 110 Additional Features

Bajaj Platina 110 is an ideal choice for riders as it features - 

  • Semi-Digital Instrument Console - Offers users easy access to information like the clock, odometer, gear-shift indicator and more. 
  • Single-Channel ABS - Gives users maximum control over the pressure applied to the front wheel of the bike.
  • CBS - This system reduces the braking distance and improves the stability of the bike while braking.
  • USB Charging Port - An in-built charging port that lets you keep your phone charged when going on a long-distance trip.
  • FI-System - This system makes sharper and quicker throttle response with improved mileage delivery. 
  • Gear-Shift Indicator - Indicates you to change gears depending on the speed, which assists you in achieving better mileage.

Bajaj Platina 110 Variants

Bajaj Platina 110 is available in 2 other variants based on the type of braking system in the bike.

Bajaj Platina 110 Competitors - The Best Alternatives

Here are a few popular competitors offering similar performance and riding experiences at competitive price ranges. 

  • TVS Radeon - Rs 60,925 - 78,834
  • Honda Livo - Rs 75,002 - 79,002
  • Hero Passion Pro - Rs 73,305 - 80,858
  • Hero HF Deluxe - Rs 54,360 - 65,938

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Interceptor 650 Bike is manufactured by Royal Enfield, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 648 CC engine that produces 34.9 kW @ 7250 rpm power, 23 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

The Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 2023 is a classic retro motorcycle with a hint of a modern look and has gained a cult following since its first release in 2018. Interceptor 650 price ranges between Rs 2.88 to 3.14 Lakh in India. The cruiser bike is powered by a smooth & responsive 648 CC, parallel-twin cylinder, 4-stroke / SOHC engine. The BS6-compliant engine can easily churn out 47 bhp & 52 Nm of peak torque. 

With a total fuel tank capacity of 13.7 Litres, you can cover 315.1 km in one go. In addition, RE Interceptor 650 Mileage of 23 kmpl is best in its segment. Furthermore, this cruiser bike can achieve a top speed of 170 kmph. Featuring a 6-speed gearbox, wet multi-plate clutch, dual-channel ABS, spoked wheels and a comfortable riding position. 

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Engine Specifications

The Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 2023 is a timeless classic with a robust BS-VI engine. It comes with a 648 CC, parallel-twin cylinder, 4-stroke / SOHC engine. This highly responsive engine can easily belt out a maximum power output of 34.9 kW at 7250 rpm & 52.3 Nm @ 5150 rpm. The Bs6 engine is further tuned to a 6-speed constant mesh gearbox with a fuel injection system. 

With an electric start and a rugged air-cooled engine, this cruiser bike is truly a delight to ride on.

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Price In India

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 price in India falls slightly on the expensive side (Rs 2.88 - 3.14 Lakh). However, given the future-forward features it offers, the price remains justified. 

Model NamePrice in India
Royal Enfield Interceptor 650Rs 2.88 - 3.14 Lakh

New Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Mileage

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 has created a niche for itself in the Indian 2-wheeler market. And its mileage is among the most attractive aspects of it. With this cruiser motorcycle, you can easily achieve a mileage of 23 Kmpl.

Model NameMileage
Royal Enfield Interceptor 65023 Kmpl

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Technical Specifications

From the throaty growl of its engine to the sleek curves of its body, the Interceptor 650 is packed with advanced specs including -

FrameSteel Tubular, Double Cradle FrameOffers an ideal balance of strength, stability, and comfort, reducing driver fatigue.
SuspensionFront - Telescopic forks:Offer a balance of improved handling & comfort, with ease of maintenance and customizability.
Rear - Twin Gas-Charged Shock Absorbers With Adjustable Preloadoffer a range of benefits-improved safety, ride quality, handling, durability, ease of maintenance, and customizability.
BrakesFront - Disc Brakes:320 mm front disc brake offers added braking power.
Rear - Disc Brakes:240 mm rear disc brake offers smooth and powerful braking.
Dual-Channel ABS:Prevents wheels from latching up in case of sudden braking.
Wheels & Tyres:Wheels Size & Type:Alloy / Spoke wheels of 18 M/C x MT 2.50 in front and 18 M/C x MT 3.50 in the rear.
Tyres Size & Type:Tubed tyres 100/90 - 18 for the front & 130/70 for the rear.
Dimensions:Length -2119 mm
 Width -835 mm
 Height -1067 mm
 Wheelbase -1398 mm
 Ground Clearance -174 mm
 Seat Height -804 mm
 Kerb Weight -218 kg

Royal Enfield Interceptor 650 Additional Features

With timeless styling & multiple value-adding features, the Interceptor 650 is an ideal choice for riders looking for reliability and modern features like the following:

  • USB charging port: Practical & convenient feature enhances the riding experience and provides added safety and security for riders, allowing them to charge their electronics on the road.
  • Analogue-digital instrument cluster: Analogue displays information such as speed, tachometer, fuel gauge, gear indicator, and trip metres. The instrument cluster is easy to read and provides all the information a rider needs at a glance.
  • Classic styling: The teardrop-shaped fuel tank, spoke wheels, and twin exhaust pipes give it a retro look. It pays tribute to the original Interceptor from the 1960s but with modern features.
  • Electric Start: Adds to convenience as the engine can start with a push of a button, and is highly reliable as they don’t wear out over time and offers higher resale value.

attributes.content:
Kawasaki Z900 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Z900 Bike is manufactured by Kawasaki, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Kawasaki Z900 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 948 CC engine that produces 123.29 bhp @ 9500 rpm power, 15.26 Kmpl Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Kawasaki Z900 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Kawasaki Z900 is a powerful sports naked bike designed to deliver an exhilarating riding experience for the users. It features a liquid-cooled, 4-stroke, DOHC engine with a 948 cc displacement capable of producing up to 123.29 bhp @ 9500 rpm and 98.6 Nm @ 7700 rpm peak torque. The engine enables users to reach a top speed of 195 Kmph and a mileage of 15.26 Kmpl. This bike is available at a price of Rs 9.02 Lakh in India.

The bike’s chassis is made of lightweight aluminium, and it has a sleek and aggressive design that sets it apart from other naked bikes. Other notable features include advanced electronics, such as Kawasaki’s Intelligent anti-lock Brake System (KIBS), traction control, and multiple riding modes. The Z900 is known for its excellent handling and performance on the road, making it a popular choice for riders who want a high-performance naked bike.

Kawasaki Z900 Engine Specifications

The Kawasaki Z900 engine is a Liquid-cooled, 4-stroke, In-Line Four Cylinder engine with a displacement of 948 cc. It produces maximum output of 123.29 bhp @ 9500 rpm and 98.6 Nm @ 7700 rpm of peak torque, making it a powerful and responsive engine. 

The engine features a 16-valve (4 valves per cylinder) DOHC design, with a fuel injection system that delivers precise fuel metering for improved efficiency and throttle response. The engine is perfectly paired with a 6-speed transmission, with a slipper clutch for smooth shifting and reduced rear-wheel hop during hard downshifts. 

Overall, the Kawasaki Z900 engine is a high-performance powerplant that offers a thrilling riding experience.

Kawasaki Z900 Price In India

The Z900 is a premium sports-naked bike in India with a highly aggressive pricing range. Find below the accurate Kawasaki Z900 price in India (ex-showroom).

 

Kawasaki Z900 Mileage

Find below the accurate Kawasaki Z900 mileage; the company claims the bike could deliver in ideal riding conditions. 

 

Kawasaki Z900 Technical Specifications

Here is a breakdown of all the technical aspects of the powerhouse - Kawasaki Z900.

  • Transmission - This sporty bike features a 6-speed gearbox transmission system with a return shift mechanism, allowing for faster and smoother gear changes. 
  • Clutch - It has a wet multi-disc clutch that helps dissipate heat and reduce wear. 
  • Suspension - For the front suspension, the bike comes with a 41 mm inverted fork with rebound damping and spring preload adjustability with a 120 mm travel. For the rear suspension, the bike comes with a Horizontal Back-link with rebound damping and spring preload adjustability with 140 mm travel. 
  • Brakes - At the front, the bike is fitted with 300 mm Double Disc brakes. Whereas, at the rear, the bike is fitted with 250 mm Disc brakes. The bike features a dual-channel ABS braking system that prevents the wheels from locking up during hard braking and provides additional stability.
  • Tyres - This naked sport bike comes equipped with tubeless tyres of 120/70-17 inches in the front and 180/55-17 inch tyres in the back. 
  • Dimensions - Z900 overall length is 2070 mm, width is 825 mm, height of 1080 mm, wheelbase of 1455 mm and ground clearance of 145 mm.
  • Weight - This bike is built to have a kerb weight of 212 kg, which is relatively light making the bike easy to handle and manoeuvre through the roads. 

Kawasaki Z900 Additional Features

Since its first launch in 2017, Kawasaki Z900 has received multiple upgrades and improvements. Here are some of the key additional features the bike boasts today.

  • Assist & Slipper Clutch: The assist & slipper clutch is a unique feature that helps to reduce clutch lever effort while also preventing rear-wheel hop during downshifts. This allows for smoother and more confident gear changes.
  • Power Mode Selection: The Z900 comes with a power mode selection system that allows riders to adjust the bike's power delivery to suit their preferences and riding conditions. The system offers two different power modes: Full and Low.
  • Integrated Riding Modes: Kawasaki offers riding modes selection for the users to choose among 3 settings (Road, Rain, Sport) or a manual setting where each system can be set independently. This feature allows riders to set traction control & power delivery as per the riding situation.
  • Kawasaki Traction Control (KTRC): KTRC is a sophisticated traction control system that helps to prevent wheel spin and loss of control in slippery or uneven road conditions. The system uses sensors to monitor wheel speed, throttle position, and other factors and then adjusts engine power and throttle response to maintain traction and stability.
  • LED Lighting: The Z900 comes with full LED lighting, including a powerful headlight, taillight, and turn signals. LED lighting provides better visibility and helps to improve safety, especially in low-light conditions.
  • Digital Instrument Cluster: The Z900's digital instrument cluster provides a ton of information to riders, including speed, RPM, fuel level, gear position, and more. The display is easy to read and provides a clear view of all essential information.
  • Adjustable Suspension: The Z900 comes with a fully adjustable suspension, including a 41mm upside-down fork and a rear shock with adjustable preload and rebound damping. This allows riders to individually adjust the bike's suspension to suit their preferences and riding style.
  • Lightweight Frame: The Z900 features a lightweight trellis frame that provides excellent rigidity and handling performance. The frame is designed to be strong and durable while also being lightweight and responsive.

Kawasaki Z900 Variants

Kawasaki Z900 Competitors in the Market

Kawasaki Z900 is a powerhouse when it comes to performance. Its premium feel is truly to experience at least once. However, there are 3 other bikes that are fairly similar and compete with Z900 directly. 

  • Triumph Street Triple 765 R - Rs 9.15 Lakh

attributes.content:
The Kawasaki Ninja 300 is a sports bike designed and manufactured by the Japanese public multinational corporation manufacturer. This bike has unique and aerodynamic bodywork and is offered at a price cut of Rs 3.4 Lakh in India.

The bike features a liquid-cooled, 296cc parallel-twin engine that delivers smooth and responsive power of 38.88 bhp and 26.1 Nm of peak torque. It has a 6-speed transmission and a slipper clutch, which makes shifting gears easy and smooth. This sports bike comes with a fuel tank capacity of 17 Litres. In addition, with Ninja 300, you can achieve a mileage of 32.1 Kmpl and a top speed of 160 Kmph.

Other notable features of the Kawasaki Ninja 300 include a digital instrument cluster, adjustable suspension, and a braking system of a single disc in the front and rear. It also has optional ABS (Anti-lock Braking System), providing additional safety and control.

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Engine Specifications

Kawasaki Ninja 300 sports bike is powered by a 296cc, liquid-cooled, 4-stroke, DOHC, parallel-twin engine type with a fuel injection system. It produces a maximum power output of 38.88 bhp @ 11,000 rpm and a maximum torque output of 26.1 Nm @ 10,000 rpm.

The engine is tuned to a 6-speed transmission and has a wet multi-plate clutch. It also features a slipper clutch, which helps to reduce rear-wheel hop during aggressive downshifting. In addition, the Ninja 300’s engine is designed for smooth, linear power delivery and excellent throttle response. 

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Price In India

The Kawasaki Ninja 300 price in India is as aggressive and competitive as its styling and features. Check the table below to find the accurate ex-showroom price of the bike.

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Mileage

Kawasaki Ninja 300 is a highly powerful sports bike in its segment. But with power, the brand has equipped the bike to deliver the best-in-class mileage as well. 

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Technical Specifications

Suspension:

This Kawasaki bike features a 37mm telescopic fork for the front suspension, providing 120mm of travel. The rear suspension is a bottom-link Uni-Trak system with a gas-charged shock and adjustable preload, providing 132mm of travel.

Brakes:

The front brake of this bike features a single 290mm petal-type disc with a two-piston hydraulic calliper, while the rear brake is a single 220mm petal-type disc with a two-piston hydraulic calliper. It further features a dual-channel ABS for added safety.

Tyres:

The bike has tubeless tyres, with a front tyre size of 110/70-17 and the rear tyre size of 140/70-17.

Dimensions:

The overall length of the Kawasaki sports bike is 2,015 mm, while the overall width is 715 mm, and the overall height is 1,110 mm. The wheelbase is 1,405 mm, and the ground clearance is 140 mm. 

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Additional Features

The Kawasaki Ninja 300 is a popular sport bike with various features designed to enhance its performance and appeal. Some of the additional features of the Kawasaki Ninja 300 include:

  • Dual-channel ABS: It comes with dual-channel ABS as standard, providing additional safety and stability during braking.
  • Fuel injection system: The bike features a fuel injection system that improves fuel efficiency and performance.
  • Slipper clutch: The slipper clutch helps to reduce rear-wheel chatter during downshifts and provides a smoother ride.
  • Digital instrument cluster: The bike has a digital instrument cluster that provides information such as speed, RPM, fuel level, etc.
  • Lightweight chassis: The bike’s lightweight chassis provides nimble handling and manoeuvrability.
  • Adjustable suspension: The suspension of this bike can be adjusted to suit the rider's weight and riding style.

Overall, the Kawasaki Ninja 300 is a well-rounded sportbike with various features designed to enhance its performance, safety, and comfort.

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Variants

Kawasaki offers 1 other variant to its Ninja 300 model. 

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Competitors in the Market

Ninja 300 is a highly powerful and attractive-looking sports bike in the Indian market. Check the list below of all the models that directly compete with this bike - 

  • Kawasaki Ninja 400 - Rs 5.14 Lakh
  • KTM 390 Duke - Rs 2.96 Lakh
  • TVS Apache RR 310 - Rs 2.72 Lakh
  • Bajaj Dominar 400 - Rs 2.25 Lakh
  • KTM RC 390 - Rs 3.16 Lakh

Kawasaki Ninja 300 Monthly Sales

TVS Raider 125 is a premium commuter bike launched by TVS Motor Company in India with a price tag of Rs 93,719. The TVS Raider 125 receives power from a 124.8 cc single-cylinder, air-cooled, three-valve engine that produces 11.2 bhp @ 7,500 rpm of power & 11.2 Nm @ 6,000 rpm of torque. In addition, the engine features an Idle Stop-Start system and two ride modes (Eco & Power). The company claims that the bike can deliver a mileage of 57 Kmpl and reach a top speed of 99 kmph.

 

The TVS Raider 125 is available in 4 colours & 3 variants. This commuter bike has a modern & sporty design with an LED headlight, body-coloured headlight cowl, split-style saddle, aluminium grab rail, and engine cowl. And with a total fuel tank capacity of 10 litres, you can cover 570 km without needing to refuel.

TVS Raider 125 Engine Specifications

The TVS Raider 125 draws power from a 124.8cc, single-cylinder, air-cooled, three-valve engine that delivers 11.2bhp of power at 7,500rpm & 11.2Nm of peak torque at 6,000rpm. The engine is tuned to a five-speed transmission & Wet multi-plate clutch. 

The bike features a silent with ISG intelligent auto start-stop technology promoting the smoothest drive-off experience for the riders. 

TVS Raider 125 Price In India

TVS Raider 125 price starts from ₹ 86,803 and goes up to ₹ 1,01,000 in India. However, it is necessary to know the on-road price of the TVS Raider 125 may differ in various states, depending upon the government’s taxation policies. 

 

TVS Raider 125 Mileage

TVS Raider 125 BS6 has a total fuel tank capacity of 10 L, letting you cover longer distances without worrying about refuelling. The TVS Raider 125 has a claimed mileage of 57 km/l under standard test conditions. 

 

TVS Raider 125 Technical Specifications

The technical specifications of the TVS Raider 125 are simple but reliable.

  • Braking System - The braking duties on the bike are handled by 130 mm drum brakes fitted on both the front and rear. The bike features a Synchronised Braking Technology as standard.
  • Suspension System - For suspension duties, the bike is built with Telescopic Shock Absorbers at the front and a mono-shock, 5-step adjustable, Gas charged at the rear. 
  • Type of Tyres - TVS Raider 125 comes with tubeless 17-inch tyres on both front and rear.
  • Dimensions - TVS Raider 125 is 2070 mm in length, 785 mm in width & 1028 mm in height. Furthermore, it has a wheelbase of 1326 mm and a ground clearance of 180 mm. 
  • Weight - This TVS bike has a kerb weight of 123 kg.

 

TVS Raider 125 Additional Features

Here are multiple value-adding features of TVS Raider 125 that set it apart from its rivals:

  • Voice Assist & Navigation - TVS comes with these new features for easy Navigation and Voice Assistant.
  • Digital Display and Riding Modes - The bike provides Reverse LCD digital cluster & ride modes.
  • Braking System - This system is designed to provide users with a quick braking response through its Synchronised Braking Technology.
  • Gear shift Indicator - The Gear shift indicator makes it easy to determine the current gear position.
  • Safety - TVS Raider 125 provide worry-free rides and impeccable safety with its 240 mm roto petal disc brakes.

 

TVS Raider 125 Variants

This model is available in 3 variants. Here is the list of all 3 Hero Splendor variants, along with their ex-showroom price (Delhi).

 

TVS Raider 125 Competitors

The TVS Raider 125 is known for continuous advancement in technologies and features. However, it faces competition with the following models in the Indian market, such as:

In addition, you can use your innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put TVS Raider 125 against your other preferred options easily.

We have also made an exclusive section where you can find all the authentic TVS dealership showrooms in your preferred city, along with their address and contact details.

Furthermore, you get all the latest bike and brand updates through our news section. So now you can find TVS Raider 125 mileage, engine type, power output, weight, handling, ergonomics and more all under one roof.

attributes.content:
Kawasaki Ninja 650 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Ninja 650 Bike is manufactured by Kawasaki, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Kawasaki Ninja 650 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 649 CC engine that produces 67.07 bhp @ 8000 rpm power, 21 Kmpl Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Kawasaki Ninja 650 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Kawasaki Ninja 650 is a premium sports-touring bike manufactured by a Japanese multinational company - Kawasaki. It is a powerful bike that features a 649cc, liquid-cooled, parallel-twin engine that belts out 67.07 bhp and 64 Nm peak torque. The engine provides the bike with a mileage of 21 Kmpl and a top speed of 210 Kmph. It comes with a price tag of Rs 7.12 Lakh in India.

It boasts a range of modern amenities, such as a digital instrument cluster, LED headlights and taillights, and optional ABS. The motorcycle also has a slipper clutch and an assist and slipper clutch for improved performance and handling. The Ninja 650 is versatile and suitable for daily commuting and long-distance touring, with a total fuel tank capacity of 15 Litres. 

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Engine Specifications

Kawasaki Ninja 650 is built with a 649cc Liquid-cooled, 4-stroke Parallel Twin engine type. This engine can produce a peak output power of 67.07 bhp @ 8000 rpm and 64 Nm @ 6700 rpm of peak torque. 

This sport bike features a fuel-injection system with dual throttle valves, which provides smooth and responsive power delivery. The engine is perfectly tuned to a 6-speed transmission gearbox and has a slipper clutch for smoother downshifts. Additionally, the engine has a high-mounted exhaust system that enhances the bike's sporty look and delivers an exciting exhaust note.

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Price In India

Explore the updated and accurate Kawasaki Ninja 650 Price in India below - 

 

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Mileage

Kawasaki Ninja 650 is a sports bike that is built to deliver maximum performance. The mileage of this bike is fairly decent.

 

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Technical Specifications

Kawasaki Ninja 650 comes with a range of future-forward technical components that makes it a powerful beast.

  • Transmission - The bike is equipped with a 6-speed gearbox with a positive, neutral finder that provides smoother shifting between gears.
  • Frame - The 650’s trellis high-tensile steel frame provides a lightweight but rigid platform that allows for easy handling and maximum stability at high speeds. 
  • Suspension - The sports bike is built with a 41 mm telescopic fork in the front with 125 mm travel and a horizontal back-link with adjustable preload in the back with 130 mm travel.
  • Brakes - Ninja 650 boasts an excellent braking system that consists of dual semi-floating 300mm petal discs with dual-piston callipers in the front and a single 220mm petal disc with a single-piston calliper in the back.
  • Tyres - This Ninja bike features a set of tubeless tyres. The front tyre is 120/70ZR17, whereas the rear tyre is 160/60ZR17. This set of tyres delivers excellent grip in a variety of road conditions. 
  • Dimensions - As for the dimensions, the bike has an overall length of 2,055 mm, width of 740 mm, height of 1,135 mm, wheelbase of 1,410 mm and a ground clearance of 130 mm, providing maximum stability at higher speeds. 
  • Weight - Despite its sporty performance, the Ninja 650 has a kerb weight of 196 kg, making it relatively lightweight and easy to manoeuvre around the city.

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Value Adding Features

The Kawasaki Ninja 650 has several additional features that set it apart from its predecessor and other motorcycles in its class. Some of the notable features include

  • Full digital instrumentation: The Ninja 650 has a full digital LCD instrumentation panel that displays speed, RPM, fuel level, trip meter, gear position, and more.
  • Assist & slipper clutch: This feature allows for smooth downshifts and prevents rear wheel lock-up during aggressive downshifting.
  • LED lighting: The Ninja 650 has full LED lighting, including headlights, taillights, and turn signals, which provide better visibility and a sleek appearance.
  • Adjustable windscreen: The windscreen can be adjusted to three different positions, allowing riders to find the optimal wind protection for their riding style.
  • Ergonomic design: The Ninja 650 has a comfortable, upright riding position that reduces rider fatigue and increases comfort on long rides.
  • ABS brakes: The bike has ABS brakes that provide superior stopping power and prevent the wheels from locking up during hard braking.
  • Quick Shifter: The Ninja 650 has a quick shifter, allowing smooth and quick gear changes without using the clutch.
  • Bluetooth & Mobile connectivity: The bike can be equipped with Kawasaki's Rideology App, which allows riders to connect their smartphone to the bike and access various features, such as GPS navigation, ride data logging, and more.

Kawasaki Ninja 650 Variants

Include any variants that might be available.

attributes.content:
Royal Enfield Himalayan Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Himalayan Bike is manufactured by Royal Enfield, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Royal Enfield Himalayan Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 411 CC engine that produces 24.3 bhp @ 6,500 rpm power, 32.4 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Royal Enfield Himalayan Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.
 

The Royal Enfield Himalayan is India’s most powerful adventure bike, available at a price ranging between Rs 2.15 to 2.22 Lakh. The Himalayan BS6 is specifically manufactured for your off-roading adventures with a robust 411cc, air-cooled, single-cylinder, SOHC engine. This adventure bike offers a maximum power output of 24.3 bhp & 32 Nm.
 

The Royal Enfield Himalayan mileage is 32.4 Kmpl with a total fuel tank capacity of 15 Litres. With this bike, you can easily reach a top speed of 145 kmph. In addition, you get additional features like dual-channel ABS, a windshield, a skid plate and luggage mounts, making it a perfect choice for your long-distance trips. Additionally, it features a compass, a unique feature that helps you navigate through unfamiliar terrain easily. Royal Enfield Himalayan color options include- Sleet Black, Gravel Grey, Granite Black, Pine Green, Glacier Blue, and Dune Brown.
 

Royal Enfield Himalayan Engine Specifications
 

At the heart of Himalayan Royal Enfield lies a powerful 411 cc, single-cylinder, air-cooled engine. This RE engine is capable of delivering a maximum output power of 24.3 bhp @ 6,500 rpm and 32 Nm @ 4,500 rpm of peak torque. The engine is further paired with a 5-speed gearbox and features a fuel injection system that ensures smooth & efficient power delivery. 
 

With these features, the Himalayan can easily reach a top speed of 145 kmph, making it an ideal option for riders who crave speed and adventure.
 

Royal Enfield Himalayan Price In India
 

Royal Enfield Himalayan Price in India is among the most popular aspects of this bike. The bike’s price starts at Rs 2.15 Lakhs and goes up to Rs 2.22 Lakhs. 

New Royal Enfield Himalayan Mileage

The Royal Enfield Himalayan 350 mileage is among the biggest selling points of the bike. This bike offers a high mileage of 32.4 kmpl which adds to better fuel economy.

Royal Enfield Himalayan Technical Specifications
 

Himalayan Royal Enfield is power-packed with the following specifications that make it a most suitable choice for off-roading, touring, or simply commuting around the city.
 

 

Royal Enfield Himalayan Additional Features
 

The Royal Enfield Himalayan 2023 is a popular adventure-touring bike with multiple additional features that support off-road riding & long-distance touring.
 

  • Long-Travel Suspension: It features a 41 mm telescopic fork at the front and a mono-shock at the rear, which helps to absorb bumps and rough terrain easily.
     
  • Spoked Wheels: Provides better grip and stability on off-road terrain.
     
  • Dual-Purpose Tyres: Offers good traction on both on-road and off-road surfaces.
     
  • Ground Clearance: The Himalayan has a high ground clearance of 220mm, making navigating rough terrain and obstacles easier.
     
  • Windshield: The tall windshield provides protection from wind and debris while riding at higher speeds.
     
  • ABS: The dual-channel ABS helps to prevent the wheels from locking up during sudden braking.
     
  • Fuel Tank: The large fuel tank, with a capacity of 15 litres, enables longer rides without the need for frequent refuelling.
     
  • Comfortable Seat: The comfortable, long seat allows for extended hours of riding without causing discomfort.
     

Royal Enfield Himalayan Variants

At BikeJunction, we strive to deliver you the most accurate and updated information on Royal Enfield Himalayan specs. With us, you can easily scroll through all the details, including engine specs, power output, handling, mileage, value-adding features and more. 
 

In addition, you can also use our innovative & easy-to-use comparison tool that lets you put RE Himalayan against your other preferred options. We have made it simple for you to get the most accurate Royal Enfield Himalayan Ex showroom price in the country. 
 

And last but not least, if you wish to know more about the brand Royal Enfield, you can explore our news section. In this exclusive section, we regularly provide you updates on the brand and all its upcoming launches.
