Yamaha R15 V4 is a popular sports bike manufactured by Yamaha Motor Company. This Yamaha sports bike is available for price ranging between Rs 1.81 - 1.92 Lakh. Its 155 cc, liquid-cooled, 4-stroke & valve LC4V, SOHC fuel-injected engine with VVA outputs 18.15 bhp & 14.7 Nm. The BS6-compliant engine is tuned to a 6-speed gearbox. 

The Yamaha R15 V4 has a fuel tank capacity of 11 Litres. With this high-performing bike, you can easily achieve a mileage of 45 Kmpl and a top speed of 140 kmph. Additionally, the LED lighting, digital instrument cluster, slipper clutch and adjustable suspension system make this bike a delight to cruise through the highways. The engine is further equipped with a Quick Shifter & a Traction Control System, adding to the rider’s driving experience. 

Yamaha R15 V4 Engine Specifications

Yamaha R15 V4 is built with the 4th generation of its legendary R15, sharing the same DNA as its super sports bike - YZF R1. It comes with the 155 CC, liquid-cooled, 4-stroke & valve LC4V, SOHC fuel-injected engine with VVA. The BS6-compliant engine can churn out a maximum power output of 18.15 bhp at 10000 rpm & 14.2 Nm at 7500 rpm. 

Yamaha R15 V4 engine comes with VVA (Variable Valve Actuation) that delivers stronger torque output for efficient use even at low RPM rates. Yamaha R15 V4 top speed is 140 kmph, thanks to its high-performing engine. 

Yamaha R15 V4 Price In India

The Yamaha R15 V4 ex-showroom price in India starts from Rs 1.81 lakhs and goes up to Rs 1.92 lakhs.

Yamaha R15 V4 Mileage

With Yamaha R15 V4, you can easily reach a mileage of 45 Kmpl, making it a highly fuel-efficient sports bike option in the market. 

Yamaha R15 V4 Technical Specifications

Refer to the table below to learn all the advanced technological features Yamaha R15 V4 comes with-

Yamaha R15 V4 Additional Features

Yamaha R15 V4 is the epitome of high-performing super sports bikes in India. Some of the additional features of this Yamaha bike include the following -

  1. Slipper Clutch: Helps in smoother downshifts and prevents wheel hop during aggressive riding.
  2. Variable Valve Actuation (VVA): The VVA technology adjusts the valve timing and lift to optimise power delivery & fuel efficiency across different RPM ranges.
  3. Dual-Channel ABS: Provides better control and stability while braking on wet or slippery surfaces.
  4. LED Lights: Enhances the overall look while also providing better visibility & safety.
  5. LCD Instrument Cluster: Displays a host of information, including speed, RPM, fuel level, gear position, and trip metres.
  6. Bluetooth Connectivity: The motorcycle can be paired with the Yamaha Motorcycle Connect X app via Bluetooth, which provides features like turn-by-turn navigation, call and message alerts, and bike diagnosis.
  7. Aero Fairing: The aerodynamically designed fairing looks sporty, reduces wind resistance & improves stability at high speeds.

Jawa 42 is a retro-styled cruiser bike manufactured by Classic Legends, a subsidiary of Mahindra & Mahindra. It is powered by a 293cc, liquid-cooled, 4-Stroke, single-cylinder DOHC engine that produces 26.96 bhp maximum power and a peak torque of 27.02 Nm. The engine is tuned to a 6-speed gearbox with a slipper clutch. The price range of Jawa 42 in India is Rs 1.67 - 1.81 Lakh.

The bike also features a double-cradle frame, telescopic front forks & twin gas-charged shock absorbers at the rear. The Jawa 42 has a kerb weight of 172 kg and comes with disc brakes at both ends. Other notable features include a digital instrument cluster, LED tail light, and alloy wheels. Jawa 42 gives a mileage of 33 Kmpl and a top speed of 130 Kmph. The Jawa 42 is available in 6 colour options, Galactic Green (Matte), Halley's Teal (Matte), Lumos Lime (Matte), Starlight Blue (Matte), Comet Red (Glossy) and Nebula Blue (Glossy). Jawa 42 is targeted or best for bike riders who are looking for a modern motorcycle with classic styling.

Specifications of Jawa 42 Engine

The Jawa 42 engine is a 293 cc, single-cylinder, liquid-cooled, four-stroke engine that produces a maximum power output of 26.96 bhp and a peak torque of 27.02 Nm. The engine is tuned to a 6-speed gearbox and features fuel injection technology. 

The bike has a top speed of around 130 km/h and offers a smooth, refined riding experience with notable low-end torque. Additionally, the engine has a modern, compact design and complies with BS6 emission norms, making it more eco-friendly than its predecessors.

Jawa 42 Price In India

Jawa 42 price in India is highly competitive in terms of the set of features and technically advanced components it comes with. Check the table below to find its ex-showroom price range in India.

Jawa 42 Mileage

Overall, the Jawa 42 offers a fairly decent mileage of around 33 kmpl, which is in line with other bike rivals, like TVS Ronin 225, Honda CB350 RS, Royal Enfield Classic 350, Honda Hness CB350, JAWA Perak, Royal Enfield Meteor 350 and more.

Jawa 42 Technical Specifications

  • Suspension: Jawa 42 features telescopic hydraulic forks at the front and a gas-canister twin shock hydraulic rear suspension. This setup provides a comfortable ride on both smooth and rough surfaces.
  • Brakes: It is built with a front 280 mm disc brake and a rear 153 mm disc brake. The bike further features dual-channel ABS that provides the user with improved stopping power and control.
  • Tyres: This Jawa bike comes with tube tyres. The front tyre size is 90/90-18, and the rear tyre size is 120/80-17. These tyres provide good grip and stability on the road.
  • Dimensions: It has a length of 2,122mm, a width of 789mm, and a height of 1,165mm. It has a wheelbase of 1,369mm, a ground clearance of 165mm, and a seat height of 765 mm. 
  • Weight: This bike has a kerb weight of 172 kg, which makes it easy to handle and manoeuvre, especially in city traffic.

Overall, the Jawa 42 is a well-designed and balanced motorcycle with excellent suspension, brakes, and tyres. Its compact dimensions and light weight make it easy to handle, while its classic styling and modern features make it a popular choice among riders.

Jawa 42 Additional Features

The Jawa 42 is a retro-styled motorcycle that is designed to offer a blend of modern technology and classic design. Some of the additional features of the Jawa 42 include:

  • Dual-channel ABS: This cruiser bike comes equipped with dual-channel ABS (anti-lock braking system), which helps in providing better stability and control during emergency braking.
  • Instrument cluster: It features a retro-looking instrument cluster that consists of an analogue speedometer, odometer, and a digital fuel gauge.
  • Disc brakes: This Jawa Bike features disc brakes at the front and rear, providing better-stopping power and reducing the risk of skidding.
  • Fuel injection technology: The motorcycle is equipped with fuel injection technology, which ensures better fuel efficiency and smoother power delivery.

Overall, the Jawa 42 comes with a range of additional features that make it a more modern and comfortable motorcycle while still retaining its classic design.

Jawa 42 Variants

Check the table below to get the list of all the available Jawa 42 variant models in India.

Jawa 42 Rivals

Here’s the list of top 5 Jawa 42 rivals in the Indian 2-wheeler market right now.

  • Benelli Imperiale 400 - Rs 1.89 Lakh
  • Honda Hness CB350 - Rs 1.16 - 2.06 Lakh
  • Royal Enfield Hunter 350 - Rs 1.5 - 1.69 Lakh
  • Bajaj Dominar 250 - Rs 1.82 Lakh
  • Royal Enfield Meteor 350 - Rs 2.01 - 2.18 Lakh

Why BikeJunction for Jawa 42?

BikeJunction is a one-stop destination where you can explore and learn about all the information regarding the new Jawa 42 Price in India, technical specifications and more. In addition, you can use our innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put Jawa 42 against its other rivals in the market. 

We have also made an exclusive section where you can find all the authentic Jawa dealership showrooms in your preferred city, along with their address and contact details.

Furthermore, you get all the latest bike and brand updates in our news section. So now you can find Jawa 42 mileage, engine type, power output, weight, handling, ergonomics and more all under one roof. So, what are you waiting for? Bring home the keys to your new Jawa 42 bike today with BikeJunction!

attributes.content:
TVS Jupiter Scooter is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Jupiter Scooter is manufactured by TVS, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. TVS Jupiter Scooter belongs to the Scooter category. The Scooter boasts high-tech specifications like 109.7 CC engine that produces 7.37 bhp @ 7,000 rpm power, 60.44 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. TVS Jupiter Scooter is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

TVS Jupiter is a popular scooter model manufactured by TVS Motor Company. Since its debut in 2013, it has become one of the most demanding scooters in the Indian market. The Jupiter is powered by a 109.7cc single-cylinder, air-cooled engine that produces 7.47 bhp and 8.4 Nm of torque. It has a fuel tank capacity of 5 litres and can deliver a mileage of around 60.44 kmpl, depending on riding conditions and maintenance.

Some of the notable features of TVS Jupiter include a digital-analogue instrument cluster, LED headlamps, alloy wheels, front disc brake, and an optional smartphone connectivity feature known as the TVS SmartXonnect. The scooter is available in six variants - Standard, ZX, ZX Disc, Classic, SMW and Jupiter Classic ET-Fi - and comes in a range of colours, including matte blue, matte silver, matte copper, black, white, and red.

In general, commuters who are looking for a scooter that is dependable, comfortable, and packed with features for their daily commute favour the TVS Jupiter.

TVS Jupiter Engine Specifications

TVS Jupiter has a 109.7cc, Single cylinder, 4-stroke, CVTi fuel injection engine. The engine is capable of delivering a maximum output power of 5.8 kW @ 7500 rpm and a maximum torque of 8.8 Nm @ 5500 rpm. It has an air-cooled cooling system with Automatic CVT Transmission.

The TVS Jupiter's engine is known for its smoothness and reliability and is equipped with an Ecothrust Fuel injection technology which enhances its performance and fuel efficiency.

TVS Jupiter Price in India

The TVS Jupiter price is low and is easily affordable to the middle class. TVS Jupiter price starts from ₹ 71,390 and goes up to ₹ 87,693 in India. 

 

TVS Jupiter Mileage

The mileage of the TVS Jupiter scooter varies depending on various variables, including traffic, road conditions, rider weight, and regular maintenance. The Jupiter scooter normally gives a mileage of 60.44 kmpl under standard test conditions. There is always a need to ride your scooter at the recommended speed, undergo routine maintenance, and use less fuel to get the most mileage out of it.

 

TVS Jupiter Technical Specifications

The TVS Jupiter comes with telescopic front suspension and gas-filled rear shock absorbers, which provide a comfortable ride on uneven roads. It is equipped with drum brakes in the front and rear, with the option of a disc brake in the front for better stopping power. The scooter runs on tubeless tyres size 90/90-12 at the front and rear, offering a good grip on the road.

 

TVS Jupiter Additional Features

The TVS Jupiter offers a variety of extra features to improve the riding experience and make it a popular option for Indian scooter consumers. Here are a few of its other attributes:

  • Ecothrust Fuel Injection Technology: The TVS Jupiter has Ecothrust Fuel Injection Technology, which improves the air-fuel combination, resulting in greater fuel economy and reduced emissions.
  • LED Headlamp: The scooter has a strong, brilliant LED headlight that improves vision in low light settings and lights the road ahead.
  • Digital Instrument Cluster: The TVS Jupiter is equipped with a digital instrument cluster that serves as a means of displaying crucial data like speed, fuel level, trip metre, odometer, and more.
  • External Fuel Filling: The scooter includes an external fuel filling function that enables users to refuel the vehicle without getting off.
  • Mobile Charger: The TVS Jupiter has a mobile charging outlet that enables passengers to charge their smartphones while they are out or riding.
  • Underseat Storage: The scooter has a large enough space in the under-seat storage compartment where a helmet, documents, and other usable items of the same size can be put.
  • Multi-Function Key: The scooter has a multi-function key that may be used to open the seat, fuel tank, and exterior storage space.
  • Tubeless Tyres: The TVS Jupiter has tubeless tyres, which lessen the possibility of unexpected flats and provide greater traction on the pavement.

TVS Jupiter Variants

TVS Jupiter offers 3 variants for users to choose from its two-wheeler scooter. Refer to the table below to explore each variant’s name and price in India.

** Note, this is the Ex-showroom price in India.

TVS Jupiter Competitors in the Market

“TVS Jupiter” directly competes with the following scooter models in the Indian 2-wheeler market -

  • Honda Activa 6G - Rs. 76819
  • Hero Maestro Edge 125 - Rs. 77,896
  • Yamaha Fascino 125 Fi Hybrid - Rs. 76100
  • Suzuki Access 125 - Rs. 79600
  • Hero Pleasure Plus - Rs. 77318 

TVS Jupiter Monthly Sales

The number of units sold in the previous 3 months was given in the data below:

 

Why Bike Junction for TVS Jupiter?

At BikeJunction, we strive to deliver you the most accurate and updated information on TVS Jupiter specs. With us, you can easily scroll through all the details, including engine specs, power output, handling, mileage, value-adding features and more. 

In addition, you can also use our innovative & easy-to-use comparison tool that lets you put Jupiter scooty against your other preferred options. We have made it simple for you to get the most accurate TVS Jupiter Ex-showroom price in the country. 

And last but not least, if you wish to know more about the TVS brand, you can explore our news section. In this exclusive section, we regularly provide you updates on the brand and all its upcoming launches.

The Yamaha Fascino 125 is a scooter model from Yamaha Motor India with a price tag of Rs 78,600 - 91,030. This Yamaha scooter is powered by a 125 cc, blue core, Air-cooled, 4-stroke, SOHC, 2-valve engine that churns out 8.09 bhp & 10.3 Nm. With this engine, you can easily achieve a mileage of 68.75 Kmpl and reach a top speed of 90 Kmph. 

This Yamaha scooter is available in 6 colour variants- Vivid Red, Yellow Cocktail, Cyan Blue, Metallic Black, Cool Blue Metallic & Dark Matte Blue. Moreover, the scooter boasts advanced features like E20 fuel compatibility, a Y-connect app & Yamaha's Stop & Start System. 

Yamaha Fascino 125 Engine Specifications

Yamaha Fascino 125 scooter is powered by a 125cc single-cylinder, air-cooled, fuel-injected engine. This BS6-compliant engine is capable of producing 8.2 bhp of power at 6,500 rpm and 10.3 Nm of torque at 5,000 rpm. The engine is tuned to a Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT). 

The scooter has a fuel tank capacity of 5.2 litres and has a claimed top speed of around 90 Kmph. It also features Yamaha's “Stop & Start” system, which automatically turns off the engine when the vehicle is stationary for more than 5 seconds and turns it on again when the throttle is twisted, resulting in improved fuel efficiency.

Yamaha Fascino 125 Price In India

The Yamaha Fascino 125 price in India is aggressively set. Available in 5 variants and a range of attractive colours, the price range of Fascino 125 ranges between Rs 78,600 - 91,030. This scooter is feature-packed and offers best-in-class performance making it a great choice, especially for the younger generation.

Yamaha Fascino Mileage

Yamaha Fascino 125 is fitted with a powerful engine that lets you, as a rider, achieve a mileage of 68.75 Kmpl. 

Yamaha Fascino 125 Technical Specifications

Here are all the technical details of the Yamaha Fascino 125 that put it above all its rivals in the Indian market. 

Yamaha Fascino 125 Additional Features

The Yamaha Fascino 125 comes with several additional features that enhance the riding experience, which are as follows -

  • LED Headlamps: Offers excellent visibility in low-light conditions.
  • Multi-Function Key Switch: Comes with several useful functions like a seat opener, fuel lid opener, and an external fuel filling cap for added convenience.
  • Side Stand Engine Cut-Off Switch: Ensures that the engine automatically switches off if the side stand is engaged, preventing accidents.
  • Smart Motor Generator System: Offers a smooth start & stops function and saves fuel by automatically stopping the engine when idle for too long.
  • Combined Braking System: Ensures efficient & safe braking by distributing braking force to both wheels simultaneously.
  • Large Under-Seat Storage Space: Offers ample under-seat space - 21.8 L, making it easy to carry essentials like a helmet, bag, or other items.
  • Easy-to-Read Instrument Panel: Features a speedometer, odometer, fuel gauge, and trip meter for added convenience.

attributes.content:
Jawa Perak is an attractive and unique-looking cruiser bike manufactured by Classic Legends Private Limited under the Jawa brand. It is a bobber-style motorcycle with a low-slung stance, matte black finish, and minimalistic design. It comes with a price range of Rs 2.09 Lakh in India.

The Jawa Perak is powered by a BS6-compliant, 334 cc liquid-cooled, single-cylinder engine that belts out 30 bhp and 32 Nm of torque, paired with a 6-speed gearbox. The motorcycle features a double-cradle frame, telescopic front suspension, and a mono-shock rear suspension. It also has disc brakes on both the front & rear wheels, along with dual-channel ABS for added safety. Furthermore, it features a 14 L fuel tank capacity. With this bike, you can achieve a mileage of 34.05 kmpl and reach a top speed of 130 kmph.

The Jawa Perak offers a comfortable riding experience with a single seat, forward-set footpegs, and wide handlebars. It is a popular choice among Indian bike fanatics who value style, performance, and unique design.

Jawa Perak Engine Specifications

The Jawa Perak is a cruiser motorcycle powered by a single-cylinder, liquid-cooled, 334 cc engine. Here are the detailed engine specifications:

  • Engine Type: Single Cylinder, Liquid Cooled, 4-Stroke, DOHC
  • Displacement: 334 cc
  • Max Power: 30.22 bhp @ 8,200 rpm
  • Max Torque: 32.74 Nm @ 6,000 rpm
  • Transmission: 6-Speed Gearbox
  • Fuel System: Fuel Injection
  • Ignition: Digital CDI
  • Exhaust: Twin Exhaust with Matte Black Finish

The Jawa Perak engine is fitted to deliver a balance of power and torque for a smooth and comfortable cruising experience. It is also compliant with the latest BS6 emission norms in India.

Jawa Perak Price In India

Check the table to learn the accurate Jawa Perak Price in India (ex-showroom).

Jawa Perak Mileage

Check out the table below to learn about how much mileage Jawa claim that the Perak can achieve - 

It's worth noting that mileage figures mentioned by the manufacturer are usually obtained under ideal riding conditions in a controlled environment. The actual fuel efficiency can differ based on various factors, such as road conditions, traffic, and individual riding habits.

Jawa Perak Technical Specifications

  • Suspension: Perak is equipped with a telescopic hydraulic fork suspension at the front and a 7-step adjustable mono-shock suspension at the rear. This suspension setup provides a comfortable ride and good handling on different types of roads.
  • Brakes: The Jawa Perak is equipped with a 280mm disc in the front and a 240mm disc in the rear. The braking system offers a good balance between stopping power and control, providing a safe riding experience.
  • Tyres: The Jawa Perak comes with a 100/90-18 size tyre at the front and a 140/70-17 size tyre at the rear. The tyres offer a good grip and stability on different types of roads, providing a smooth and comfortable ride.
  • Dimensions: The Jawa Perak has an overall length of 2,191 mm, an overall width of 789 mm, and an overall height of 1,116 mm. The motorcycle has a wheelbase of 1,485 mm and a ground clearance of 145 mm. The motorcycle's seat height is 750 mm, making it comfortable for riders of different heights to ride the bike.
  • Weight: The Jawa Perak has a kerb weight of 179 kg, which makes it a bit heavy compared to some other motorcycles in its class. However, the weight distribution is well balanced, providing good handling and stability on different types of roads.

Jawa Perak Additional Features

  1. Instrument Cluster: Perak has an analogue & digital instrument cluster that displays information such as a speedometer, odometer, and fuel gauge.
  2. LED Lighting: The motorcycle features LED taillights that offer good visibility and safety during night rides.
  3. Exhaust: This bike is built with a distinctive twin-muffler exhaust system that looks stylish and provides a good exhaust note.
  4. Single-Seat: The bike has a single floating seat that adds to its sporty and sleek design.
  5. Safety Features: This Jawa bike features a dual-channel ABS (Anti-lock Braking System) and a slipper clutch that prevents wheel lockup during sudden braking and ensures smooth downshifts, respectively.

Overall, the Jawa Perak is a well-designed motorcycle that balances style, performance, and safety features.

Jawa Perak Variants

Jawa Perak is offered in 1 other variant - 

Jawa Perak Competitors in the Market

Jawa Perak is a highly competitive cruiser bike in India, thanks to its perfect blend of retro look with powerful performance.

  • Royal Enfield Classic 350 - Rs 1.9 - 2.21 Lakh
  • Benelli Imperiale 400 - Rs 1.89 Lakh
  • Bajaj Dominar 400 - Rs 1.82 Lakh
  • Royal Enfield Hunter 350 - Rs 1.5 - 1.69 Lakh
  • KTM RC 200 - Rs 2.15 Lakh

Why BikeJunction for Jawa Perak?

attributes.content:
The Royal Enfield Bullet 350 is a timeless masterpiece embodying the spirit of classic motorcycling. With its vintage styling and old-world charm, this iconic bike has captured the hearts of riders for over seven decades. And let's not forget the signature thumping sound of the engine that adds to its charm.

 

This retro-cruiser bike has been in production since the 1940s and comes with a price tag of Rs 1.48 - 1.63 Lakh in India. The bike is powered by a 346 cc, Single cylinder, 4 strokes, air-cooled, fuel injection engine. This engine can easily belt out 19.1 bhp & 28 Nm peak power output and is perfectly tuned to a 5-speed gearbox. 
 

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 offers a mileage of 37.17 Kmpl and a top speed of 110 kmph. The bike features a total fuel tank capacity of 13.5 Litres. In addition, RE offers Bullet 350 in 3 variants and in 3 colour options - Onyx Black, Black & Bullet Silver.
 

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Engine Specifications
 

The Royal Enfield Bullet 350 BS6 is not just a pretty face; it packs a punch too. It comes with a 346cc, Single cylinder 4 stroke, air-cooled, fuel injection engine. This BS6-Compliant engine can easily chalk out a peak power output of 19.1 bhp @ 5,250 rpm and 28 Nm @ 4,000 rpm. 
 

The cruiser bike features a manual transmission system of a 5-speed gearbox and a wet multi-plate (6 plates) clutch system. With a fuel tank capacity of 13.5 Litres, the bike can easily run up to 513 km. 
 

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Price In India
 

The Royal Enfield Bullet 350 ex-showroom price in India starts at Rs 1.48 Lakhs and goes up to Rs 1.63 Lakhs. The price tag is justified, given the features this cruiser bike offers. 

New Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Mileage
 

With this Royal Enfield Bullet 350 BS6 cruiser bike, you can easily cover 37.17 Km per litre of fuel. The mileage of this bike is among the biggest selling-point, given its high fuel efficiency. 

 

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Technical Specifications
 

  • Frame: Features a single downtube steel frame which is sturdy, durable and provides added stability for the rider.
     
  • Suspension: Fitted with a traditional telescopic 35 mm fork suspension at the rear with 130 mm travel. At the rear, the bike has a twin-shock absorber with a 5-step adjustable preload and 80 mm travel. Both contribute to a bump-free and stable ride.
     
  • Brakes: Features 280 mm disc brakes for the front tyres and 153 mm drum brakes for the rear with a single-channel ABS ensuring strong and reliable stopping power, further adding to rider safety.
     
  • Wheels & Tyres: The 19-inch Spoke wheels with 90/90 tubed tyre at the front & 110/90 tubed tyre at the rear offer good grip & traction on all kinds of terrains while also giving good stability. 
     
  • Dimensions: With a length of 2,170 mm, a width of 810 mm, a height of 1,120 mm, and a wheelbase of 1,395 mm, you get good stability and better handling. The ground clearance of this cruiser bike is 135 mm, which is sufficient to handle uneven terrains effortlessly.
     
  • Weight: The bike is built to have a kerb weight of 186 kg, which gives it good stability and balance on the road.
     

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Additional Features
 

  • ABS: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) helps prevent the wheels from latching up during sudden braking, providing better control and safety.
     
  • Fuel Injection System: Provides better fuel efficiency, smoother acceleration, and improved throttle response compared to the carbureted version.
     
  • Halogen Headlamp: Provides better visibility at night and in low-light conditions.
     
  • Spoke Wheels: The traditional spoke wheels add to their classic look and feel while also providing better durability and strength.
     
  • Instrument Cluster: The Bullet 350 has an analogue instrument cluster that displays speed, fuel level, and other essential information.
     
  • Accessories: Royal Enfield offers a range of accessories for the bike, including saddlebags, crash guards, windshields, and more
     

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Variants
 

Royal Enfield offers the Bullet 350 BS6 cruiser bike with 3 variant models for you to choose from -

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 directly competes with the following cruiser bike models in the Indian 2-wheeler market -

Royal Enfield Bullet 350 Monthly Sales
 

Here’s what the Royal Enfield Bullet 350 sales figures looked like in the last 3 months - 

Why BikeJunction for Royal Enfield Bullet 350?
 

At BikeJunction, we strive to bring forth accurate and updated information on Royal Enfield Bullet 350 BS6 price & specs. With us, you can readily scroll through all the details, including engine specs, power output, handling, mileage, value-adding features and more. 
 

In addition, you can also use our innovative & easy-to-use comparison tool that lets you put RE Bullet 350 against your other preferred options. We have made it simple for you to get the most accurate Royal Enfield Bullet 350 ex showroom price in the country. 
 

And last but not least, if you wish to know more about the brand Royal Enfield, you can explore our news section. In this exclusive section, we regularly deliver updates on the brand and all its upcoming launches.

The new Suzuki Access 125 is the flagship scooter model manufactured by the Japanese manufacturer. This scooter features a revolutionary SEP technology that combines unmatched power delivery with best-in-class mileage. It comes equipped with a 124 CC, Air Cooled, 1 Cylinder, 2 Valve engine that produces 8.6 bhp and 10 Nm peak torque. This Suzuki scooter is available at a price range of Rs 77,230 - Rs 87,200 in India. 

 

Suzuki Access 125 BS6 delivers a mileage of 52.45 Kmpl, letting you cover longer distances at lower fuel consumption. In addition, you can achieve a top speed of 90 Kmph. With this scooter, you also get a fuel tank capacity of 5 litres and under-seat storage of 21.8 litres, which is quite decent compared to its other competitors in the market. 

Suzuki Access 125 Engine Specifications

Suzuki Access 125 BS6 is a high-performing scooter fitted with a 124 CC, Air Cooled, 1 Cylinder, 2 Valve engine type. This BS6-compliant scooter delivers users with a peak power output of 8.6 bhp @ 6,750 rpm and 10 Nm @ 5,500 rpm of peak torque. In addition to this, the scooter is able to reach a top speed of 90 Kmph and a mileage of 52.45 Kmpl. 

Access 125 engine is equipped with Suzuki’s exclusive SEP (Suzuki Eco Performance) technology that offers users an excellent balance of low fuel consumption and superior acceleration and performance. This scooter also features Fuel Injection System, which adds to a better driving experience for the users. 

Suzuki Access 125 Price In India

Find the accurate Suzuki Access 125 BS6 price in India in the table below -

Suzuki Access 125 Mileage

Suzuki Access 125 mileage is one of the best-selling features that the scooter offers its users. If you are looking for a mode of transportation that will help you cut down your daily fuel expenses, then this scooter is definitely something you should consider.

Suzuki Access 125 Technical Specifications

  • Suspension - Access 125 suspension system features a Telescopic at the front and Swing Arm at the rear, offering a smoother ride experience to its users. 
  • Brakes - As for the brakes, the scooter features 120 mm drum brakes in the front and rear. This scooter uses a CBS braking system that combines both brakes for a smoother stopping experience.  
  • Tyres - The scooter comes with tubeless tyres on either side of the scooter with dimensions of 90/90 - 12 inches for the front and 90/100 – 10 inches for the rear. 
  • Dimensions - This Suzuki scooter comes with an overall length of 1870 mm, width of 690 mm, and height of 1160 mm. In addition, it has a wheelbase of 1265 mm and a ground clearance of 160 mm. 
  • Weight - The kerb weight of the Access 125 scooter is measured at 104 kg, making it quite lightweight and easy to manoeuvre around the city. 

Suzuki Access 125 Additional Features

Explore all the additional features of the Suzuki Access 125 that make it such a popular choice in the Indian market. 

  • E20 Compliant - The new Suzuki Access 125 is now E20-compliant, which means that this scooter will be able to run on ethanol-mixed petrol now. This will make the scooter more eco-friendly. 
  • LED Lighting  - This popular scooter features an LED headlamp that offers users a bright & wide radiated light spread while the chrome surrounding provides a premium touch to it. 
  • Bluetooth Enabled Digital Console - This includes multiple features such as missed call & caller ID alerts, SMS & WhatsAlert, ETA updates, phone battery level, over-speed warning, etc.
  • Fuel Injection System - Access 125's fuel injection system ensures smooth and efficient fuel delivery, which results in better performance and fuel economy.
  • Combined Braking System (CBS) - The Access 125 is available with an optional CBS system that provides better stability and control while braking.

Suzuki Access 125 Variants

Check the table below to find the complete list of all the variant models that Suzuki offers, along with their accurate ex-showroom price range -

Suzuki Access 125 Competitors in the Market

Suzuki Access 125 is a well-rounded scooter, offering a wide range of features that cater to the needs of modern-day riders. However, a few scooters give Access 125 major competition in the market, including -

  • Hero Maestro Edge 125 - Rs 77,196 - 86,066
  • Honda Activa 125 - Rs 78,082 - 85,254
  • TVS Jupiter 125 - Rs 83,605 - 90,405
  • Yamaha Fascino 125 - Rs 78,600 - 91,030
  • Suzuki Burgman Street 125 - Rs 89,287 - 92,851

Suzuki Access 125 Monthly Sales

Suzuki Access 125 boasts a huge number in terms of sales per month. Check the table below to explore what its sales figures looked like in the past 3 months -

In addition, you can use our innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put the Access 125 against its other rivals in the market.

KTM 200 Duke Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The 200 Duke Bike is manufactured by KTM, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. KTM 200 Duke Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 199.5 CC engine that produces 18.4 kW @ 10000 rpm power, 35 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. KTM 200 Duke Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

KTM Duke 200 is a lightweight Sports Naked bike that offers an excellent blend of power, handling, and style. It is designed suitably for both urban and rural environments. However, it comes with a price tag of Rs 1.92 Lakh in India.

The bike features a 199.5 cc single-cylinder engine that produces 25.48 bhp and 19.5 Nm of torque, providing ample power for both highway cruising and city commuting. This sports bike delivers a good mileage of 35 kmpl. The bike is equipped with a 6-speed transmission, allowing riders to shift gears to match their speed and riding style easily. It comes with a total fuel tank capacity of 13.5 litres and can reach a top speed of 142 Kmph.

The bike's handling is enhanced by a lightweight steel trellis frame, which provides excellent stability and manoeuvrability. The suspension system consists of inverted front forks and a rear mono-shock, which absorb bumps and vibrations on rough roads. It has LED lights, digital instrumentation, and disc brakes on both wheels for improved safety.

KTM Duke 200 Engine Specifications

KTM Duke 200 engine is a powerful Single Cylinder, 4 Valve, Liquid Cooled, FI, DOHC engine with a displacement of 199.5 cc. It is capable of producing 25.48 bhp @ 10,000 rpm and 19.5 Nm @ 8000 rpm of torque and is perfectly tuned to a 6-speed gearbox. The engine is also equipped with an electronic fuel injection system for efficient fuel delivery and combustion.

KTM Duke 200 Price In India

Check the table below to find the accurate KTM Duke 200 ex-showroom price in India.


KTM Duke 200 Mileage

KTM Duke 200 is designed to deliver unmatched performance rather than best-in-class fuel efficiency. Check the table below to see this bike’s claimed mileage delivery.

KTM Duke 200 Technical Specifications

KTM Duke 200 is a well-engineered naked bike that features future-forward components throughout. 

  • Suspension: The front suspension consists of WP upside-down forks with a 43mm diameter, while the rear suspension is a WP mono shock. The suspension is also adjustable, allowing riders to fine-tune the bike's handling to their preferences.
  • Brakes: The KTM Duke 200 features a 300mm disc with a four-piston calliper at the front, while the rear brake is a 230mm disc with a single-piston calliper. The bike also features a Bosch ABS system, which helps to prevent wheel lock-up and to skid, improving safety and control.
  • Clutch: The KTM Duke 200 features a hydraulic clutch promoting smooth and precise operation. The clutch lever is adjustable, allowing riders to tailor the clutch engagement to their preferences.
  • Tyres: Duke 200 has high-performance Metzeler tyres that offer excellent grip and handling. The front tyre is a 110/70 R17, while the rear tyre is a 150/60 R17.

KTM Duke 200 Value-Adding Features

The KTM Duke 200 is a popular entry-level sports motorcycle that comes with a range of value-adding features to enhance the riding experience. Here are some of the notable additional features of the KTM Duke 200:

  • ABS: This KTM bike comes equipped with an Anti-lock Braking System (ABS), which helps to prevent the wheels to lock up during sudden braking, thereby improving safety.
  • Digital Instrument Console: The Duke 200 features a modern digital instrument console that provides riders with real-time information about their speed, gear position, fuel level, and other essential parameters.
  • LED Headlights: The Duke 200 comes with a stylish LED headlight that provides excellent visibility in low-light conditions, improving safety and aesthetics.
  • Aluminum Swingarm: The KTM Duke 200 features a lightweight aluminium swingarm that improves stability and handling, especially at high speeds
  • Underbelly Exhaust: The Duke 200 features a unique underbelly exhaust that not only enhances the bike's sporty appearance but also improves ground clearance and weight distribution.

KTM Duke 200 Variants

KTM Duke 200 is available in 1 other variant in India.

KTM Duke 200 Competitors in the Market

KTM Duke 200 is a feature-packed motorcycle that offers an excellent blend of performance, style, and functionality. However, there are 5 other bikes in the market that directly compete with Duke 200, which you should consider too. 

  • Royal Enfield Bullet 350 - Rs 1.48 - 1.63 Lakh
  • Husqvarna Svartpilen 250 - Rs 2.2 Lakh
  • KTM Duke 125 - Rs 1.78 Lakh
  • Suzuki Gixxer SF 250 - Rs 1.92 - 2.03 Lakh
  • Yamaha R15 V4 - Rs 1.81 - 1.92 Lakh

Why BikeJunction for KTM Duke 200?

BikeJunction is a one-stop destination where you can explore and learn all the information regarding the new KTM Duke 200 Price in India, technical specifications and more. In addition, you can use our innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put Duke 200 against its other rivals in the market. 

We have also made an exclusive section where you can find all the authentic KTM dealership showrooms in your preferred city, along with their address and contact details.

Furthermore, you get all the latest bike and brand updates in our news section. So now you can find KTM Duke 200 mileage, engine type, power output, weight, handling, ergonomics and more all under one roof. So, what are you waiting for? Bring home the keys to your new KTM Duke 200 bike today with BikeJunction!

Hero Splendor Plus is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. Splendor Plus is among the highest-selling commuter bikes by Hero MotoCorp in the Indian market. Splendor Plus is manufactured by Hero, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. With a sturdy bulletproof built quality, simple design, high mileage of 60 Kmpl & a top speed of 87 kmph, Hero Splendor Plus is among the highest-selling commuter bikes in India. The ex-showroom price range of Hero Splendor Plus is Rs 70,933 to Rs 72,125.

 

Hero Splendor Plus boasts high-tech specifications like a 97.2 CC engine that produces 5.9 kW @ 8000 rpm power and powered by a BS6-compliant 97.2cc, air-cooled, 4-stroke single-cylinder engine. The bike further features an electric start, integrated braking system, i3S technology, tubeless tyres and more. Hero Splendor Plus has a fuel tank capacity of 9.8 litres. This bike is available in 9 different colour options and 4 different variants. 

Hero Splendor Plus Engine Specifications

Hero Splendor Plus is fitted with a 97.2 CC Air-Cooled, 4-Stroke, Single Cylinder, OHC engine type. This BS6-Compliant engine generates a total power output of 7.91 bhp @ 8000 rpm and 8.05 nm torque @ 6000 rpm. This engine is perfectly tuned with a 4-speed gearbox.

Hero Splendor Plus Price In India

Hero Splendor Plus price starts from ₹ 72,076 and goes up to ₹ 74,396 in India. BikeJunction provides you a complete list of the updated and accurate price range of Hero Splendor Plus. However, it is necessary to know that the on-road price of the Splendor Plus may differ from state to state, depending upon their specific government taxation policies.

 

Hero Splendor Plus Mileage

The BS6 Hero Splendor Plus has a 9.8-litre fuel tank capacity along with i3S technology (Idle Stop-Start System). In addition, it boasts a programmed fuel injection fuel system that significantly helps boost the bike mileage. The mileage of Hero Splendor Plus is 60 Kmpl which is very adequate and provides a good driving range.

 

Hero Splendor Plus Technical Specifications

The technical specifications of the new Hero bike are simple but reliable. 

  • Braking System - The braking duties on the bike are handled by 130 mm drum brakes fitted on both front and rear. The bike features a combined braking system as standard.
  • Suspension System - For suspension duties, the bike is built with Telescopic Hydraulic Shock Absorbers at the front and a Swingarm with 5-step Adjustable Hydraulic Shock Absorbers at the rear. 
  • Type of Tyres - Splendor+ comes with tubeless 18-inch tyres on both front and rear.
  • Dimensions - Splendor+ is 2000 mm in length, 720 mm in width and 1236 mm in height. Furthermore, it has a wheelbase of 1236 mm and a ground clearance of 165 mm. 
  • Weight - This Hero bike has a kerb weight of 123 kg.

Hero Splendor Plus Additional Features

Here are multiple value-adding features of Hero Splendor Plus, setting it apart from its rivals:

  • xSens Programmed Fi Technology - The tech uses a total of nine sensors to improve the performance, durability, safety, reliability and fuel economy of the bike.
  • i3S Technology - i3s stands for Idle Stop-Start System, which Hero MotoCorp developed to enhance the mileage of their bikes.
  • Integrated Braking System - This system is designed to distribute the braking force throughout the bike, giving users a quick & smooth braking experience.
  • Side Stand Indicator - This sensor provides added safety by cutting off the engine when the bike is on the side stand. The indicator is in the instrument cluster, adding to rider convenience. 
  • 5-Year Warranty - Hero MotoCorp offers a warranty of 5 years on this exclusive bike.

Hero Splendor Plus Variants

This model is available in 4 variants. Here is the list of all 4 Hero Splendor variants along with their ex-showroom price (Delhi).

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Scooter is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Burgman Street 125 Scooter is manufactured by Suzuki, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Scooter belongs to the Scooter category. The Scooter boasts high-tech specifications like 124 CC engine that produces 8.58 bhp @ 6,750 rpm power, 55.89 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Scooter is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 is an attractive & practical scooter designed for urban commuters who want a comfortable and efficient mode of transportation. Under the hood, the Burgman Street 125 is powered by a 124cc, air-cooled, single-cylinder engine that delivers a smooth and responsive performance. The BS6 engine delivers 8.58 bhp and 10 nm peak torque. The engine is mated to a CVT transmission that provides seamless acceleration. The scooter boasts a competitive price range of Rs 89,287 - 92,851.

With this scooter, you can effortlessly achieve a mileage of 55.89 Kmpl and a top speed of 95 Kmph. Furthermore, this Suzuki Scooter has 5.5 litres of fuel tank capacity and under-seat storage of 21.5 litres. It has an Eco Performance technology that helps optimize fuel efficiency and reduce emissions. 

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 BS6 Engine Specifications

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 BS6 ropes in a 124cc, single-cylinder 4-stroke & 2-valve, air-cooled engine. This engine is capable of producing a consistent power output of 8.58 bhp @ 6,750 rpm and 10 Nm @ 5,500 rpm of peak torque. 

In addition, this BS6-compliant engine is perfectly tuned to a Continuous Variable Transmission (CVT), providing an effortless riding experience. The scooter further features an intelligent & advanced Fuel Injection system that reduces emissions and improves fuel economy at the same time. 

Overall, the Suzuki Burgman Street 125 BS6 provides an ideal balance of power, efficiency & reliability. 

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Price In India

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 price in India makes it highly competitive and popular among Indian customers.

 

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Mileage

Suzuki is a brand known for delivering performance while making their range of products the most fuel efficient. Suzuki Burgan Street 125 mileage is decent, given all the features and equipment it comes with.

 

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Technical Specifications

  • Suspension - Burgman Street 125 suspension system features a Telescopic at the front and Swing Arm at the rear, offering a stable ride experience to the users.
  • Brakes - As for the brakes, the scooter features a 120 mm disc brake in the front and a 120 mm drum brake at the rear. This scooter uses a CBS braking system that combines both brakes for a smoother halt. 
  • Tyres - The scooter comes with alloy wheels & tubeless tyres on either side of the scooter with dimensions of 90/90-12 inches for the front and 90/100-10 inches for the rear.
  • Dimensions - This Suzuki scooter comes with an overall length of 1,880 mm, width of 715 mm, and height of 1,140 mm. In addition, it has a wheelbase of 1,265 mm and a ground clearance of 160 mm.
  • Weight - The kerb weight of the Burgman 125 scooter is measured at 110 kg, making it lightweight & highly manoeuvrable around the city. 

Suzuki Burgman Street 125 Additional Features

  • LED Headlight & Tail Light - LED headlights & tail lights improve visibility even at night. It gives a more modern and sleek look to the scooter. 
  • Digital Instrument Cluster - The scooter features a fully digital instrument cluster that gives users an easy view of all the necessary information, including speed, fuel level, etc.
  • Combined Braking System (CBS) - This Burgman scooter has a CBS that ensures both front & rear brakes are applied at the same time, improving the scooter's braking performance.
  • Large Underseat Storage - This Suzuki scooter is built to have large under-seat storage that can easily accommodate a helmet and other essentials.
  • Fuel Injection System - The scooter comes equipped with a fuel injection system that delivers users better fuel efficiency & maximum performance.
  • Multi-function Key Switch - This feature provides users easy Burgman to various features, including under-seat storage, fuel tank, and more.

Honda CD 110 Dream Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The CD 110 Dream Bike is manufactured by Honda, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Honda CD 110 Dream Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 109.51 CC engine that produces 8.67 bhp @ 7500 rpm power, 65 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Honda CD 110 Dream Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Honda CD 110 is a commuter bike offering a comfortable ride, good mileage, and reliable performance. Honda CD 110 Price in India is set at Rs 71,133 and draws its power from a 109.51 cc engine with eSP Technology that delivers 8.67 bhp of power and 9.30 Nm of torque. Honda claims CD 110 can offer a mileage of 65 kmpl and can reach a top speed of 86 kmph. 

The bike further features a 4-speed manual transmission and a combined braking system, ensuring effective braking and safety. The bike has 18-inch alloy wheels wrapped in 80/100-section tubeless tyres that offer good grip and high puncture resistance. The bike comes with a total fuel tank capacity of 9.1 litres and a kerb weight of 112 kg.

CD 110 Dream comes with Honda’s latest innovation - Enhanced Smart Power (eSP) technology that helps enhance performance & fuel efficiency by reducing friction.

Honda CD 110 Engine Specifications

The Honda CD 110 has a single-cylinder, 4-stroke, SI, BS-VI Engine with eSP Technology that enhances fuel efficiency, reduces friction, and improves combustion. The engine has a displacement of 109.51 cc and produces a maximum power of 8.67 bhp @ 7500 rpm & a peak torque of 9.30 Nm @ 5500 rpm. The engine is tuned to a 4-speed manual gearbox that offers smooth shifting and easy riding. The engine also features a Silent Starter with ACG that ensures a quick and quiet start.

Honda CD 110 Price In India

The Honda CD 110 price in India is set at Rs. 71,310 (ex-showroom). However, the price might come on the bike’s location, colour, and availability.

 

 

Honda CD 110 Mileage

The Honda CD 110 claims to offer a mileage of 65 kmpl. However, the mileage may differ depending on the riding conditions, maintenance, and riding style.

 

Honda CD 110 Technical Specifications

Refer the table below to learn about the technical components Honda CD 110 Dream boasts - 

 

 

Honda CD 110 Unique Features

The Honda CD 110 Dream is built to have several noteworthy technological features. Here are some unique features in the bike:

  • HET (Honda Eco Technology): Optimises the engine's performance to deliver improved fuel efficiency without compromising power output. 
  • Enhanced Smart Power (eSP) Engine: Focuses on reducing friction within the engine & improving combustion efficiency, resulting in enhanced performance, better mileage, & lower emissions.
  • Honda Eco Mileage (HEM) Indicator: A useful technology that helps riders maintain a fuel-efficient riding style. It provides real-time feedback on fuel consumption, encouraging economical riding habits.
  • Integrated Headlamp & Visor: Enhances the aerodynamics & aesthetics of the motorcycle. This feature provides improved visibility & adds a stylish touch to the overall design.
  • Combi-Brake System (CBS): Distributes braking force between the front and rear wheels simultaneously when the rider applies the rear brake, ensuring stable & balanced braking performance.

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Meteor 350 Bike is manufactured by Royal Enfield, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 349 CC engine that produces 20.2 bhp @ 6100 rpm power, 36.2 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 is a popular cruiser bike model featuring classic styling cues & modern features, available for Rs 2.01 - 2.22 Lakh in India. At the heart of it lies a 349 cc, single cylinder, 4 stroke, air-oil cooled engine that delivers 20.2 bhp and 27 nm peak torque. With this bike, you can achieve a mileage of 36.2 Kmpl. 
 

This RE cruiser bike’s standout feature is its Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) system and a Tripper navigation system powered by Google Maps & RE App. In addition, the brand offers Meteor 350 with 3 variants and 11 colour options for users to choose from. 
 

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Engine Specifications
 

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 features a 349 cc, single cylinder, 4 stroke, air-oil cooled engine. This powerhouse of an engine can deliver a maximum power output of 20.2 bhp @ 6,100 rpm & peak torque of 27 nm @ 4,000 rpm. 

The engine is further tuned to a 5-speed gearbox that delivers an exceptional riding experience to the riders. Electronic Fuel Injection (EFI) system that ensures efficient and reliable performance delivery to the users. 
 

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Price In India
 

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 price in India ranges from Rs 2.01 Lakhs to Rs 2.22 Lakhs, which is reasonable given the performance it delivers to the users. 
 

New Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Mileage

The Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Mileage of 36.6 Kmpl lets you cover extra miles in a single go.

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Technical Specifications

 

Royal Enfield Meteor 350 Additional Features

The RE Meteor 350 BS6 cruiser bike is ideal for bike enthusiasts who appreciate classic styling and relaxed cruising. Here are some of the additional features you get that add to your riding experience - 
 

  • LED Lighting: Offers clear visibility even in low-light conditions while consuming less power as compared to traditional lighting.
     
  • Dual-Channel ABS: Provides added safety by preventing wheels from locking during sudden braking.
     
  • Chrome-Finished Exhaust: Protects your exhaust pipe against rain, sand and dust that further prevents its deformation.
     
  • Tripper Navigation System with Turn-By-Turn Directions: Powered by the RE app & Google Maps, it gives a sophisticated navigation solution by displaying through an intuitive display system.
     
  • USB Charging Port: Provides convenience by allowing you to charge your phones on the go. 
     
  • Bluetooth connectivity for phone calls and music: You can now easily connect your mobile to the bike, which will give you phone calls and text notifications along with the music.

The Suzuki Gixxer SF is a sports bike manufactured by the Japanese Motorcycle manufacturer Suzuki. This bike is built with a 155cc, 4-Stroke, 1-cylinder, Air cooled engine that belts out a peak power output of 13.41 bhp and 13.8 Nm of peak torque. Suzuki Gixxer SF BS6 boasts a mileage of 45 Kmpl and a top speed of 125 Kmph. The price of this bike starts from Rs 1.37 Lakhs and goes up to Rs 1.46 Lakhs in India.

Furthermore, its BS6 engine is perfectly tuned to a 5-speed gearbox and has an engine kill switch. This feature-rich sports bike has an aerodynamic design with sharp lines and sleek fairings. It further features a digital instrument console that shows speed, fuel level, gear position, and more information. 

Suzuki Gixxer SF Engine Specifications

Gixxer SF is powered by a 155cc, 4-stroke, 1-cylinder, air-cooled engine. The engine boasts a maximum power output of 13.41 bhp @ 8000 rpm and 13.8 Nm @ 6000 rpm of peak torque. This BS6-compliant engine is known for delivering smooth and refined performance, making it ideal for daily commutes and for longer drives. In addition, it is tuned to a 5-speed gearbox manual transmission system, offering smoother gear shifts and a comfortable riding experience. 

Furthermore, Suzuki Gixxer SF can reach a mileage of 45 Kmpl and a top speed of 125 Kmph. The key features of its engine are its fuel injection system which promotes smoother and more efficient operations of the bike. In addition, Gixxer SF offers excellent throttle response and acceleration, which is especially useful for riders who want a sporty ride without compromising on fuel economy.

Suzuki Gixxer SF Price In India

Suzuki Gixxer SF on-road price in India is highly competitive, given all the top-notch technical components and additional features it boasts. 

Suzuki Gixxer SF Mileage

Gixxer SF is capable of delivering a mileage of roughly 40 kmpl, making it one of the most fuel-efficient bikes in the segment. However, it’s important to note that the Suzuki Gixxer SF mileage may vary depending on road conditions and bike maintenance.

Suzuki Gixxer SF Technical Specifications

  • Suspension - For suspension, Gixxer SF comes with telescopic forks at the front and a mono-shock at the rear. This setup provides a comfortable ride and excellent handling characteristics. 
  • Brakes - Gixxer SF features disc brakes at the front and rear. The presence of Single-Channel ABS gives users added safety and control over the bike even during harsh braking conditions.
  • Tyres - The Gixxer SF rides on 17-inch alloy wheels that are shod with tubeless tyres. The front tyre is 100/80-17, while the rear tyre is 140/60R-17. These tyres offer excellent grip and stability, making the bike easy to ride on city roads and highways.
  • Dimensions - Suzuki Gixxer SF measures 2025 mm in length, 715 mm in width, and 1035 mm in height. The wheelbase is 1340 mm, and the ground clearance is 160 mm. 
  • Weight - This bike has a kerb weight of 148 kg, making it a lightweight motorcycle that is easy to handle and manoeuvre.

Suzuki Gixxer SF Additional Features

The Suzuki Gixxer SF is a popular sporty motorcycle with several additional features that enhance its performance, comfort, and style. Some of these features include

  • Digital instrument cluster: This bike comes with a fully digital instrument cluster that provides riders with all the necessary information, including speed, RPM, fuel level, trip meter, and more.
  • LED headlamp and taillamp: The bike features a bright LED headlamp and taillamp that offer excellent visibility, even in low-light conditions.
  • Aerodynamic design: The Gixxer SF has a sleek and aerodynamic design that helps improve its performance and handling, making it a great choice for riders who enjoy high-speed riding.
  • Clip-on handlebars: The bike features clip-on handlebars that offer a sporty riding position and enhance its overall performance.
  • Single-channel ABS: It comes equipped with a single-channel ABS that helps prevent the wheels from locking up during hard braking, providing riders with better control and safety.
  • Fuel injection system: The Gixxer SF comes with a fuel injection system that delivers a smooth and responsive throttle, making it easier to handle in different riding conditions.
  • Split seats: The bike features split seats that provide a comfortable and sporty riding position for both the rider and the passenger.

Suzuki Gixxer SF Variants

Suzuki offers its Gixxer SF bike in 1 other variant with a price of Rs 1.37 - 1.46 Lakh in India.

Suzuki Gixxer SF Competitors in the Market

Suzuki Gixxer SF BS6 is a head-turning bike that competes with following rivals in terms of price & overall performance.

Why BikeJunction for Suzuki Gixxer SF?

BikeJunction is a one-stop destination where you can explore and learn all the information regarding the new Suzuki Gixxer SF Price in India, technical specifications and more. In addition, you can use our innovative and easy-to-use comparison tool. This tool allows you to put the Gixxer SF against its other rivals in the market. 

We have also made an exclusive section where you can find all the authentic Kawasaki dealership showrooms in your preferred city, along with their address and contact details.

Furthermore, you get all the latest bike and brand updates in our news section. The Yamaha FZ S FI is a popular Sports bike boasting an array of future-forward features. It comes with a price tag of Rs. 1.21 - 1.22 Lakh in India. It is powered by an E20 Compliant, fuel-injected 149cc engine that produces around 13 bhp & 12.8 Nm of torque. With this BS6-compliant engine, you can easily achieve a mileage of 45.5 Kmpl and a top speed of 115 kmph. 

The sporty Yamaha bike features a muscular fuel tank, LED headlight, and a negative digital instrument cluster, giving it a sporty and modern look. With a total fuel tank capacity of 13 Litres, you can easily cover 591.5 km in one go. In addition, Yamaha has equipped FS S FI with features such as Bluetooth connectivity, ABS, Side Stand Engine cut-off Switch and a comfortable 2-level seat.

Yamaha FZ S FI Engine Specifications

The Yamaha FZ S FI is powered by a 149 cc, Single-cylinder, Air cooled, 4-stroke, SOHC, 2-valve engine. This BS6 and E20 fuel-compatible engine churn out 12.23 bhp @ 7250 rpm & 13.3 Nm @ 5500 rpm. 

The fuel injection system regulates the fuel flow & power, promoting smooth & responsive acceleration. This system further helps in better fuel economy & lower emissions. Overall, the Yamaha FZ S FI engine specs make it a powerful & efficient bike that can handle various riding conditions. 

Yamaha FZ S Price In India

Yamaha FZ S FI is offered at an aggressive price range of Rs. 1.21 - 1.22 Lakh in India. 

Yamaha FZ S FI Mileage

With Yamaha FZ S FI, you can effortlessly cover 45.5 Km per litre. The high-mileage delivery will let you cover more distance while ensuring lower fuel consumption. 

Yamaha FZ S FI Technical Specifications

Yamaha FZ S FI is loaded with advanced technological specifications that set it apart from its competitors in the market, which include - 

  • Suspension: 
    • Front - Telescopic fork - Provides added stability even on the most uneven terrains.
    • Rear - 7-Step Adjustable Monocross - Offers excellent shock-absorbing performance & good stability with 120 mm of wheel travel. 
  • Brakes:
    • Front - 282 mm Disc
    • Rear - 220 mm Disc
    • ABS - Single-Channel ABS prevents the wheels from locking up during sudden braking instances. 
  • Wheels & Tyres:
    • Front Wheel Type & Size - Alloy, 431.8 mm
    • Rear Wheel Type & Size - Alloy, 431.8 mm
    • Front Tyre Type & Size - Tubeless, 100/80-17
    • Rear Tyre Type & Size - Tubeless, 140/60-17
  • Dimensions:
    • Overall Length - 1990 mm
    • Overall Width - 780 mm
    • Overall Height - 1080 mm
    • Wheelbase - 1330 mm
    • Seat Height - 790 mm
    • Ground Clearance - 165 mm
    • Kerb Weight - 135 kg

Yamaha FZ S FI Additional Features

Yamaha Motor India has packed its FZ S FI with top-notch features such as -

  • LED Headlights & Tail Lamps - Offers riders excellent visibility even in low-light conditions.
  • Side Stand Engine Cutoff - An essential safety feature ensuring you don’t forget to remove the side stand during those sudden rides. 
  • Negative LCD Instrument Console - Offers a wealth of information, including speed, fuel level, and more; a great feature to help keep track of your motorcycle's performance.
  • Fuel Injection System - Helps improve fuel economy, increase power output & reduce emissions by supplying fuel directly into the engine cylinder.

Honda Shine Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Shine Bike is manufactured by Honda, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. Honda Shine Bike belongs to the Bike category. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 124 CC engine that produces 10.59 bhp @ 7500 rpm power, 65 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Honda Shine Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Honda Shine is among the most popular commuter bikes in India, offering a perfect balance of performance, efficiency, comfort & style. Honda Shine price in India is highly competitive, ranging from Rs 78,687 to 84,187. This is an ideal on-the-go bike option that provides you with a mileage of 65 Kmpl and a top speed of 102 Kmph. Powered by a 123.94 cc BS6 engine, the bike offers 10.59 bhp & 11 Nm of peak torque. 

In addition, the bike boasts a sleek, elegant look and a unique 3D Honda emblem on its fuel tank. This bike is available in 4 variants & 5 colours, with a combined braking system (CBS) as a standard feature. 

Honda Shine Engine Specifications 

The Honda Shine engine is designed to deliver an ideal balance of power & fuel efficiency suitable for daily commuting. It drives power from a 124 CC, Air Cooled, 4 Stroke, BS-VI Engine, capable of delivering maximum power of 10.59 bhp @ 7500 rpm & 11 Nm @ 6000 rpm peak torque. In addition, the engine is perfectly tuned to a 5-Speed manual gearbox, promoting a smoother drive experience. 

In addition, with Shine comes Honda’s Enhanced Smart Power (eSP) technology. This technology enhances performance & fuel efficiency while reducing friction to give you the ultimate riding experience.  

Honda Shine Price In India

The price of Honda Shine varies depending on the variant, location and colour. The ex-showroom prices of Honda Shine are as follows:  

 

Honda Shine Mileage

Honda Shine mileage is one of its key selling points. The bike offers an impressive mileage of 65 Kmpl. However, the mileage may differ depending on the riding conditions, maintenance, rider’s weight and other factors. However, Honda Shine is undoubtedly one of the most fuel-efficient bikes in its segment. 

 

Honda Shine Technical Specifications

Honda Shine is an ideal commuting partner for riders looking for a mode of transportation that is comfortable and highly fuel-efficient.  

 

Honda Shine Value-Adding Features

Honda Shine comes with some additional features that enhance its appeal and convenience. Some of these features are:

  • Digital analogue metre console with service due indicator, clock & eco-assist indicator
  • ACG starter motor for a silent and smooth start
  • Engine start/stop switch for easy operation
  • DC headlamp for bright illumination
  • Chrome muffler cover for a premium look
  • Seal chain for low maintenance
  • Side Stand Engine Cutoff for added safety
  • Robust engine with acclaimed eSP technology delivering 14% more mileage
  • Reduced braking distance due to CBS with Equaliser
